Exo  Now after a long time the king of Egypt came to his end and the children of Israel were crying in their grief under the weight of their work and their cry for help came to the ears of God
Exo  And at the sound of their weeping the agreement which God had made with Abraham and Isaac and Jacob came to his mind
Exo  And Gods eyes were turned to the children of Israel and he gave them the knowledge of himself
Exo  Now Moses was looking after the flock of Jethro his fatherinlaw the priest of Midian and he took the flock to the back of the waste land and came to Horeb the mountain of God
Exo  And the angel of the Lord was seen by him in a flame of fire coming out of a thorntree and he saw that the tree was on fire but it was not burned up
Exo  And Moses said I will go and see this strange thing why the tree is not burned up
Exo  And when the Lord saw him turning to one side to see God said his name out of the tree crying Moses Moses And he said Here am I
Exo  And he said Do not come near take off your shoes from your feet for the place where you are is holy
Exo  And he said I am the God of your fathers the God of Abraham the God of Isaac and the God of Jacob And Moses kept his face covered for fear of looking on God
Exo  And God said Truly I have seen the grief of my people in Egypt and their cry because of their cruel masters has come to my ears for I have knowledge of their sorrows
Exo  And I have come down to take them out of the hands of the Egyptians guiding them out of that land into a good land and wide into a land flowing with milk and honey into the place of the Canaanite and the Hittite and the Amorite and the Perizzite and the Hivite and the Jebusite
Exo  For now truly the cry of the children of Israel has come to me and I have seen the cruel behaviour of the Egyptians to them
Exo  Come then and I will send you to Pharaoh so that you may take my people the children of Israel out of Egypt
Exo  And Moses said to God Who am I to go to Pharaoh and take the children of Israel out of Egypt
Exo  And he said Truly I will be with you and this will be the sign to you that I have sent you when you have taken the children of Israel out of Egypt you will give worship to God on this mountain
Exo  And Moses said to God When I come to the children of Israel and say to them The God of your fathers has sent me to you and they say to me What is his name what am I to say to them
Exo  And God said to him I AM WHAT I AM and he said Say to the children of Israel I AM has sent me to you
Exo  And God went on to say to Moses Say to the children of Israel The Lord the God of your fathers the God of Abraham of Isaac and of Jacob has sent me to you this is my name for ever and this is my sign to all generations
Exo  Go and get together the chiefs of the children of Israel and say to them The Lord the God of your fathers the God of Abraham of Isaac and of Jacob has been seen by me and has said Truly I have taken up your cause because of what is done to you in Egypt
Exo  And I have said I will take you up out of the sorrows of Egypt into the land of the Canaanite and the Hittite and the Amorite and the Perizzite and the Hivite and the Jebusite into a land flowing with milk and honey
Exo  And they will give ear to your voice and you with the chiefs of Israel will go to Pharaoh the king of Egypt and say to him The Lord the God of the Hebrews has come to us let us then go three days journey into the waste land to make an offering to the Lord our God
Exo  And I am certain that the king of Egypt will not let you go without being forced
Exo  But I will put out my hand and overcome Egypt with all the wonders which I will do among them and after that he will let you go
Exo  And I will give this people grace in the eyes of the Egyptians so that when you go out you will go out with your hands full
Exo  For every woman will get from her neighbour and from the woman living in her house ornaments of silver and gold and clothing and you will put them on your sons and your daughters you will take the best of their goods from the Egyptians
Exo  And Moses answering said It is certain that they will not have faith in me or give ear to my voice for they will say You have not seen the Lord
Exo  And the Lord said to him What is that in your hand And he said A rod
Exo  And he said Put it down on the earth And he put it down on the earth and it became a snake and Moses went running from it
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Put out your hand and take it by the tail and he put out his hand and took a grip of it and it became a rod in his hand
Exo  So that they may be certain that the Lord the God of their fathers the God of Abraham of Isaac and of Jacob has been seen by you
Exo  Then the Lord said to him again Put your hand inside your clothing And he put his hand inside his robe and when he took it out it was like the hand of a leper as white as snow
Exo  And he said Put your hand inside your robe again And he put his hand into his robe again and when he took it out he saw that it had become like his other flesh
Exo  And if they do not have faith in you or give ear to the voice of the first sign they will have faith in the second sign
Exo  And if they have no faith even in these two signs and will not give ear to your voice then you are to take the water of the Nile and put it on the dry land and the water you take out of the river will become blood on the dry land
Exo  And Moses said to the Lord O Lord I am not a man of words I have never been so and am not now even after what you have said to your servant for talking is hard for me and I am slow of tongue
Exo  And the Lord said to him Who has made mans mouth who takes away a mans voice or hearing or makes him seeing or blind Is it not I the Lord
Exo  So go now and I will be with your mouth teaching you what to say
Exo  And he said O Lord send if you will by the hand of anyone whom it seems good to you to send
Exo  And the Lord was angry with Moses and said Is there not Aaron your brother the Levite To my knowledge he is good at talking And now he is coming out to you and when he sees you he will be glad in his heart
Exo  Let him give ear to your voice and you will put my words in his mouth and I will be with your mouth and with his teaching you what you have to do
Exo  And he will do the talking for you to the people he will be to you as a mouth and you will be to him as God
Exo  And take in your hand this rod with which you will do the signs
Exo  And Moses went back to Jethro his fatherinlaw and said to him Let me go back now to my relations in Egypt and see if they are still living And Jethro said to Moses Go in peace
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses in Midian Go back to Egypt for all the men are dead who were attempting to take your life
Exo  And Moses took his wife and his sons and put them on an ass and went back to the land of Egypt and he took the rod of God in his hand
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses When you go back to Egypt see that you do before Pharaoh all the wonders which I have given you power to do but I will make his heart hard and he will not let the people go
Exo  And you are to say to Pharaoh The Lord says Israel is the first of my sons
Exo  And I said to you Let my son go so that he may give me worship and you did not let him go so now I will put the first of your sons to death
Exo  Now on the journey at the nights restingplace the Lord came in his way and would have put him to death
Exo  Then Zipporah took a sharp stone and cutting off the skin of her sons private parts and touching his feet with it she said Truly you are a husband of blood to me
Exo  So he let him go Then she said You are a husband of blood because of the circumcision
Exo  And the Lord said to Aaron Go into the waste land and you will see Moses So he went and came across Moses at the mountain of God and gave him a kiss
Exo  And Moses gave Aaron an account of all the words of the Lord which he had sent him to say and of all the signs which he had given him orders to do
Exo  Then Moses and Aaron went and got together all the chiefs of the children of Israel
Exo  And Aaron said to them all the words the Lord had said to Moses and did the signs before all the people
Exo  And the people had faith in them and hearing that the Lord had taken up the cause of the children of Israel and had seen their troubles with bent heads they gave him worship
Exo  And after that Moses and Aaron came to Pharaoh and said The Lord the God of Israel says Let my people go so that they may keep a feast to me in the waste land
Exo  And Pharaoh said Who is the Lord to whose voice I am to give ear and let Israel go I have no knowledge of the Lord and I will not let Israel go
Exo  And they said The God of the Hebrews has come to us let us then go three days journey into the waste land to make an offering to the Lord our God so that he may not send death on us by disease or the sword
Exo  And the king of Egypt said to them Why do you Moses and Aaron take the people away from their work get back to your work
Exo  And Pharaoh said Truly the people of the land are increasing in number and you are keeping them back from their work
Exo  The same day Pharaoh gave orders to the overseers and those who were responsible for the work saying
Exo  Give these men no more dry stems for their brickmaking as you have been doing let them go and get the material for themselves
Exo  But see that they make the same number of bricks as before and no less for they have no love for work and so they are crying out and saying Let us go and make an offering to our God
Exo  Give the men harder work and see that they do it let them not give attention to false words
Exo  And the overseers of the people and their responsible men went out and said to the people Pharaoh says I will give you no more dry stems
Exo  Go yourselves and get dry stems wherever you are able for your work is not to be any less
Exo  So the people were sent in all directions through the land of Egypt to get dry grass for stems
Exo  And the overseers went on driving them and saying Do your full days work as before when there were dry stems for you
Exo  And the responsible men of the children of Israel whom Pharaohs overseers had put over them were given blows and they said to them Why have you not done your regular work in making bricks as before
Exo  Then the responsible men of the children of Israel came to Pharaoh protesting and saying Why are you acting in this way to your servants
Exo  They give us no dry stems and they say to us Make bricks and they give your servants blows but it is your people who are in the wrong
Exo  But he said You have no love for work that is why you say Let us go and make an offering to the Lord
Exo  Go now get back to your work no dry stems will be given to you but you are to make the full number of bricks
Exo  Then the responsible men of the children of Israel saw that they were purposing evil when they said The number of bricks which you have to make every day will be no less than before
Exo  And they came face to face with Moses and Aaron who were in their way when they came out from Pharaoh
Exo  And they said to them May the Lord take note of you and be your judge for you have given Pharaoh and his servants a bad opinion of us putting a sword in their hands for our destruction
Exo  And Moses went back to the Lord and said Lord why have you done evil to this people why have you sent me
Exo  For from the time when I came to Pharaoh to put your words before him he has done evil to this people and you have given them no help
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Now you will see what I am about to do to Pharaoh for by a strong hand he will be forced to let them go driving them out of his land because of my outstretched arm
Exo  And God said to Moses I am Yahweh
Exo  I let myself be seen by Abraham Isaac and Jacob as God the Ruler of all but they had no knowledge of my name Yahweh
Exo  And I made an agreement with them to give them the land of Canaan the land of their wanderings
Exo  And truly my ears are open to the cry of the children of Israel whom the Egyptians keep under their yoke and I have kept in mind my agreement
Exo  Say then to the children of Israel I am Yahweh and I will take you out from under the yoke of the Egyptians and make you safe from their power and will make you free by the strength of my arm after great punishments
Exo  And I will take you to be my people and I will be your God and you will be certain that I am the Lord your God who takes you out from under the yoke of the Egyptians
Exo  And I will be your guide into the land which I made an oath to give to Abraham to Isaac and to Jacob and I will give it to you for your heritage I am Yahweh

Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  Go in and say to Pharaoh king of Egypt that he is to let the children of Israel go out of his land

Exo  And Moses and Aaron did as the Lord had said and when his rod had been lifted up and stretched out over the waters of the Nile before the eyes of Pharaoh and his servants all the water in the Nile was turned to blood

Exo  Then Pharaoh went into his house and did not take even this to heart

Exo  And if you will not let them go see I will send frogs into every part of your land
Exo  The Nile will be full of frogs and they will come up into your house and into your bedrooms and on your bed and into the houses of your servants and your people and into your ovens and into your breadbasins
Exo  The frogs will come up over you and your people and all your servants

Exo  And the frogs will be gone from you and from your houses and from your servants and from your people and will be only in the Nile
Exo  Then Moses and Aaron went out from Pharaoh and Moses made prayer to the Lord about the frogs which he had sent on Pharaoh
Exo  And the Lord did as Moses said and there was an end of all the frogs in the houses and in the open spaces and in the fields

Exo  And the wonderworkers with their secret arts attempting to make insects were unable to do so and there were insects on man and on beast
Exo  Then the wonderworkers said to Pharaoh This is the finger of God but Pharaohs heart was hard and he did not give ear to them as the Lord had said

Exo  And at that time I will make a division between your land and the land of Goshen where my people are and no flies will be there so that you may see that I am the Lord over all the earth
Exo  And I will put a division between my people and your people tomorrow this sign will be seen
Exo  And the Lord did so and great clouds of flies came into the house of Pharaoh and into his servants houses and all the land of Egypt was made waste because of the flies
Exo  And Pharaoh sent for Moses and Aaron and said Go and make your offering to your God here in the land
Exo  And Moses said It is not right to do so for we make our offerings of that to which the Egyptians give worship and if we do so before their eyes certainly we will be stoned
Exo  But we will go three days journey into the waste land and make an offering to the Lord our God as he may give us orders
Exo  Then Pharaoh said I will let you go to make an offering to the Lord your God in the waste land but do not go very far away and make prayer for me
Exo  And Moses said When I go out from you I will make prayer to the Lord that the cloud of flies may go away from Pharaoh and from his people and from his servants tomorrow only let Pharaoh no longer by deceit keep back the people from making their offering to the Lord
Exo  Then Moses went out from Pharaoh and made prayer to the Lord
Exo  And the Lord did as Moses said and took away the cloud of flies from Pharaoh and from his servants and from his people not one was to be seen

Exo  Then the Lord said to Moses Go in to Pharaoh and say to him This is what the Lord the God of the Hebrews says Let my people go so that they may give me worship
Exo  For if you will not let them go but still keep them in your power

Exo  And the wonderworkers were not able to take their places before Moses because of the disease for the disease was on the wonderworkers and on all the Egyptians
Exo  And the Lord made Pharaohs heart hard and he would not give ear to them as the Lord had said
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Get up early in the morning and take your place before Pharaoh and say to him This is what the Lord the God of the Hebrews says Let my people go so that they may give me worship
Exo  For this time I will send all my punishments on yourself and on your servants and on your people so that you may see that there is no other like me in all the earth
Exo  For if I had put the full weight of my hand on you and your people you would have been cut off from the earth
Exo  But for this very reason I have kept you from destruction to make clear to you my power and so that my name may be honoured through all the earth
Exo  Are you still uplifted in pride against my people so that you will not let them go
Exo  Truly tomorrow about this time I will send down an icestorm such as never was in Egypt from its earliest days till now

Exo  And he who gave no attention to the word of the Lord kept his servants and his cattle in the field

Exo  So there was an icestorm with fire running through it coming down with great force such as never was in all the land of Egypt from the time when it became a nation
Exo  And through all the land of Egypt the icestorm came down on everything which was in the fields on man and on beast and every green plant was crushed and every tree of the field broken
Exo  Only in the land of Goshen where the children of Israel were there was no icestorm
Exo  Then Pharaoh sent for Moses and Aaron and said to them I have done evil this time the Lord is upright and I and my people are sinners
Exo  Make prayer to the Lord for there has been enough of these thunderings of God and this icestorm and I will let you go and will keep you no longer
Exo  And Moses said When I am gone outside the town my hands will be stretched out to the Lord the thunders and the icestorm will come to an end so that you may see that the earth is the Lords
Exo  But as for you and your servants I am certain that even now the fear of the Lord God will not be in your hearts
Exo  And the flax and the barley were damaged for the barley was almost ready to be cut and the flax was in flower
Exo  But the rest of the grainplants were undamaged for they had not come up
Exo  So Moses went out of the town and stretching out his hands made prayer to God and the thunders and the icestorm came to an end and the fall of rain was stopped
Exo  But when Pharaoh saw that the rain and the icestorm and the thunders were ended he went on sinning and made his heart hard he and his servants
Exo  And the heart of Pharaoh was hard and he did not let the people go as the Lord had said by the mouth of Moses
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Go in to Pharaoh for I have made his heart and the hearts of his servants hard so that I may let my signs be seen among them
Exo  And so that you may be able to give to your son and to your sons son the story of my wonders in Egypt and the signs which I have done among them so that you may see that I am the Lord
Exo  Then Moses and Aaron went in to Pharaoh and said to him This is what the Lord the God of the Hebrews says How long will you be lifted up in your pride before me let my people go so that they may give me worship
Exo  For if you will not let my people go tomorrow I will send locusts into your land
Exo  And the face of the earth will be covered with them so that you will not be able to see the earth and they will be the destruction of everything which up to now has not been damaged everything which was not crushed by the icestorm and every tree still living in your fields
Exo  And your houses will be full of them and the houses of your servants and of all the Egyptians it will be worse than anything your fathers have seen or their fathers from the day when they were living on the earth till this day And so he went out from Pharaoh
Exo  And Pharaohs servants said to him How long is this man to be the cause of evil to us let the men go so that they may give worship to the Lord their God are you not awake to Egypts danger
Exo  Then Moses and Aaron came in again before Pharaoh and he said to them Go and give worship to the Lord your God but which of you are going
Exo  And Moses said We will go with our young and our old with our sons and our daughters with our flocks and our herds for we are to keep a feast to the Lord
Exo  And he said to them May the Lord be with you if I will let you and your little ones go take care for your purpose clearly is evil
Exo  Not so but let your males go and give worship to the Lord as your desire is This he said driving them out from before him
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Let your hand be stretched out over the land of Egypt so that the locusts may come up on the land for the destruction of every green plant in the land even everything untouched by the icestorm
Exo  And Moses rod was stretched out over the land of Egypt and the Lord sent an east wind over the land all that day and all the night and in the morning the locusts came up with the east wind
Exo  And the locusts went up over all the land of Egypt resting on every part of the land in very great numbers such an army of locusts had never been seen before and never will be again
Exo  For all the face of the earth was covered with them so that the land was black and every green plant and all the fruit of the trees which was untouched by the icestorm they took for food not one green thing no plant or tree was to be seen in all the land of Egypt
Exo  Then Pharaoh quickly sent for Moses and Aaron and said I have done evil against the Lord your God and against you
Exo  Let me now have forgiveness for my sin this time only and make prayer to the Lord your God that he will take away from me this death only
Exo  So he went out from Pharaoh and made prayer to the Lord
Exo  And the Lord sent a very strong west wind which took up the locusts driving them into the Red Sea not one locust was to be seen in any part of Egypt
Exo  But the Lord made Pharaohs heart hard and he did not let the children of Israel go
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Let your hand be stretched out to heaven and all the land of Egypt will be dark so that men will be feeling their way about in the dark
Exo  And when Moses hand was stretched out dark night came over all the land of Egypt for three days
Exo  They were not able to see one another and no one got up from his place for three days but where the children of Israel were living it was light
Exo  Then Pharaoh sent for Moses and said Go and give worship to the Lord only let your flocks and your herds be kept here your little ones may go with you
Exo  But Moses said You will have to let us take burned offerings to put before the Lord our God
Exo  So our cattle will have to go with us not one may be kept back for they are needed for the worship of the Lord our God we have no knowledge what offering we have to give till we come to the place
Exo  But the Lord made Pharaohs heart hard and he would not let them go
Exo  And Pharaoh said to him Go away from me take care that you come not again before me for the day when you see my face again will be your last
Exo  And Moses said You say truly I will not see your face again
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses I will send one more punishment on Pharaoh and on Egypt after that he will let you go and when he does let you go he will not keep one of you back but will send you out by force
Exo  So go now and give orders to the people that every man and every woman is to get from his or her neighbour ornaments of silver and of gold
Exo  And the Lord gave the people grace in the eyes of the Egyptians For the man Moses was highly honoured in the land of Egypt by Pharaohs servants and the people
Exo  And Moses said This is what the Lord says About the middle of the night I will go out through Egypt
Exo  And death will come to every mothers first male child in all the land of Egypt from the child of Pharaoh on his seat of power to the child of the servantgirl crushing the grain and the first births of all the cattle
Exo  And there will be a great cry through all the land of Egypt such as never has been or will be again
Exo  But against the children of Israel man or beast not so much as the tongue of a dog will be moved so that you may see how the Lord makes a division between Israel and the Egyptians
Exo  And all these your servants will come to me going down on their faces before me and saying Go out and all your people with you and after that I will go out And he went away from Pharaoh burning with wrath
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Pharaoh will not give ear to you so that my wonders may be increased in the land of Egypt
Exo  All these wonders Moses and Aaron did before Pharaoh but the Lord made Pharaohs heart hard and he did not let the children of Israel go out of his land
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses and Aaron in the land of Egypt
Exo  Let this month be to you the first of months the first month of the year
Exo  Say to all the children of Israel when they are come together In the tenth day of this month every man is to take a lamb by the number of their fathers families a lamb for every family
Exo  And if the lamb is more than enough for the family let that family and its nearest neighbour have a lamb between them taking into account the number of persons and how much food is needed for every man
Exo  Let your lamb be without a mark a male in its first year you may take it from among the sheep or the goats
Exo  Keep it till the fourteenth day of the same month when everyone who is of the children of Israel is to put it to death between sundown and dark
Exo  Then take some of the blood and put it on the two sides of the door and over the door of the house where the meal is to be taken
Exo  And let your food that night be the flesh of the lamb cooked with fire in the oven together with unleavened bread and bittertasting plants
Exo  Do not take it uncooked or cooked with boiling water but let it be cooked in the oven its head with its legs and its inside parts
Exo  Do not keep any of it till the morning anything which is not used is to be burned with fire
Exo  And take your meal dressed as if for a journey with your shoes on your feet and your sticks in your hands take it quickly it is the Lords Passover
Exo  For on that night I will go through the land of Egypt sending death on every first male child of man and of beast and judging all the gods of Egypt I am the Lord
Exo  And the blood will be a sign on the houses where you are when I see the blood I will go over you and no evil will come on you for your destruction when my hand is on the land of Egypt
Exo  And this day is to be kept in your memories you are to keep it as a feast to the Lord through all your generations as an order for ever
Exo  For seven days let your food be unleavened bread from the first day no leaven is to be seen in your houses whoever takes bread with leaven in it from the first till the seventh day will be cut off from Israel
Exo  And on the first day there is to be a holy meeting and on the seventh day a holy meeting no sort of work may be done on those days but only to make ready what is necessary for everyones food
Exo  So keep the feast of unleavened bread for on this very day I have taken your armies out of the land of Egypt this day then is to be kept through all your generations by an order for ever
Exo  In the first month from the evening of the fourteenth day let your food be unleavened bread till the evening of the twentyfirst day of the month
Exo  For seven days no leaven is to be seen in your houses for whoever takes bread which is leavened will be cut off from the people of Israel if he is from another country or if he is an Israelite by birth
Exo  Take nothing which has leaven in it wherever you are living let your food be unleavened cakes
Exo  Then Moses sent for the chiefs of Israel and said to them See that lambs are marked out for yourselves and your families and let the Passover lamb be put to death
Exo  And take some hyssop and put it in the blood in the basin touching the two sides and the top of the doorway with the blood from the basin and let not one of you go out of his house till the morning
Exo  For the Lord will go through the land sending death on the Egyptians and when he sees the blood on the two sides and the top of the door the Lord will go over your door and will not let death come in for your destruction
Exo  And you are to keep this as an order to you and to your sons for ever
Exo  And when you come into the land which the Lord will make yours as he gave his word you are to keep this act of worship
Exo  And when your children say to you What is the reason of this act of worship
Exo  Then you will say This is the offering of the Lords Passover for he went over the houses of the children of Israel in Egypt when he sent death on the Egyptians and kept our families safe And the people gave worship with bent heads
Exo  And the children of Israel went and did so as the Lord had given orders to Moses and Aaron so they did
Exo  And in the middle of the night the Lord sent death on every first male child in the land of Egypt from the child of Pharaoh on his seat of power to the child of the prisoner in the prison and the first births of all the cattle
Exo  Then Pharaoh got up in the night he and all his servants and all the Egyptians and a great cry went up from Egypt for there was not a house where someone was not dead
Exo  And he sent for Moses and Aaron by night and said Get up and go out from among my people you and the children of Israel go and give worship to the Lord as you have said
Exo  And take your flocks and your herds as you have said and be gone and give me your blessing
Exo  And the Egyptians were forcing the people on to get them out of the land quickly for they said We are all dead men
Exo  And the people took their breadpaste before it was leavened putting their basins in their clothing on their backs
Exo  And the children of Israel had done as Moses had said and they got from the Egyptians ornaments of silver and of gold and clothing
Exo  And the Lord had given the people grace in the eyes of the Egyptians so that they gave them whatever was requested So they took away all their goods from the Egyptians
Exo  And the children of Israel made the journey from Rameses to Succoth there were about six hundred thousand men on foot as well as children
Exo  And a mixed band of people went with them and flocks and herds in great numbers
Exo  And they made unleavened cakes from the paste which they had taken out of Egypt it was not leavened for they had been sent out of Egypt so quickly that they had no time to make any food ready
Exo  Now the children of Israel had been living in Egypt for four hundred and thirty years
Exo  And at the end of four hundred and thirty years to the very day all the armies of the Lord went out of the land of Egypt
Exo  It is a watchnight before the Lord who took them out of the land of Egypt this same night is a watchnight to the Lord for all the children of Israel through all their generations
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses and Aaron This is the law of the Passover no man who is not an Israelite is to take of it
Exo  But every mans servant whom he has got for money may take of it when he has had circumcision
Exo  A man from a strange country living among you and a servant working for payment may not take part in it
Exo  It is to be taken in one house not a bit of the flesh is to be taken out of the house and no bone of it may be broken
Exo  All Israel is to keep the feast
Exo  And if a man from another country is living with you and has a desire to keep the Passover to the Lord let all the males of his family undergo circumcision and then let him come near and keep it for he will then be as one of your people but no one without circumcision may keep it
Exo  The law is the same for him who is an Israelite by birth and for the man from a strange country who is living with you
Exo  So the children of Israel did as the Lord gave orders to Moses and Aaron
Exo  And on that very day the Lord took the children of Israel out of the land of Egypt by their armies
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  Let the first male child of every mother among the children of Israel be kept holy for me even the first male birth among man or beast for it is mine
Exo  And Moses said to the people Let this day on which you came out of Egypt out of your prisonhouse be kept for ever in memory for by the strength of his hand the Lord has taken you out from this place let no leavened bread be used
Exo  On this day in the month Abib you are going out
Exo  And it will be that when the Lord takes you into the land of the Canaanite and the Hittite and the Amorite and the Hivite and the Jebusite the land which he made an oath to your fathers that he would give you a land flowing with milk and honey you will do this act of worship in this month
Exo  For seven days let your food be unleavened cakes and on the seventh day there is to be a feast to the Lord
Exo  Unleavened cakes are to be your food through all the seven days let no leavened bread be seen among you or any leaven in any part of your land
Exo  And you will say to your son in that day It is because of what the Lord did for me when I came out of Egypt
Exo  And this will be for a sign to you on your hand and for a mark on your brow so that the law of the Lord may be in your mouth for with a strong hand the Lord took you out of Egypt
Exo  So let this order be kept at the right time from year to year
Exo  And when the Lord takes you into the land of Canaan as he made his oath to you and to your fathers and gives it to you
Exo  You are to put on one side for the Lord every mothers first male child the firstfruit of her body and the first young one of every beast every male is holy to the Lord
Exo  And for the young of an ass you may give a lamb in payment or if you will not make payment for it its neck is to be broken but for all the first sons among your children let payment be made
Exo  And when your son says to you in time to come What is the reason for this say to him By the strength of his hand the Lord took us out of Egypt out of the prisonhouse
Exo  And when Pharaoh made his heart hard and would not let us go the Lord sent death on all the first sons in Egypt of man and of beast and so every first male who comes to birth is offered to the Lord but for all the first of my sons I give a price
Exo  And this will be for a sign on your hand and for a mark on your brow for by the strength of his hand the Lord took us out of Egypt
Exo  Now after Pharaoh had let the people go God did not take them through the land of the Philistines though that was near for God said If the people see war they may have a change of heart and go back to Egypt
Exo  But God took the people round by the waste land near the Red Sea and the children of Israel went up in fighting order out of the land of Egypt
Exo  And Moses took the bones of Joseph with him for Joseph had made the children of Israel take an oath saying God will certainly keep you in mind and you are to take my bones away with you
Exo  Then they went on their journey from Succoth and put up their tents in Etham at the edge of the waste land
Exo  And the Lord went before them by day in a pillar of cloud guiding them on their way and by night in a pillar of fire to give them light so that they were able to go on day and night
Exo  The pillar of cloud went ever before them by day and the pillar of fire by night
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  Give orders to the children of Israel to go back and put up their tents before Pihahiroth between Migdol and the sea in front of Baalzephon opposite to which you are to put up your tents by the sea
Exo  And Pharaoh will say of the children of Israel They are wandering without direction they are shut in by the waste land
Exo  And I will make Pharaohs heart hard and he will come after them and I will be honoured over Pharaoh and all his army so that the Egyptians may see that I am the Lord And they did so
Exo  And word came to Pharaoh of the flight of the people and the feeling of Pharaoh and of his servants about the people was changed and they said Why have we let Israel go so that they will do no more work for us
Exo  So he had his warcarriage made ready and took his people with him
Exo  And he took six hundred carriages all the carriages of Egypt and captains over all of them
Exo  And the Lord made the heart of Pharaoh hard and he went after the children of Israel for the children of Israel had gone out without fear
Exo  But the Egyptians went after them all the horses and carriages of Pharaoh and his horsemen and his army and overtook them in their tents by the sea by Pihahiroth before Baalzephon
Exo  And when Pharaoh came near the children of Israel lifting up their eyes saw the Egyptians coming after them and were full of fear and their cry went up to God
Exo  And they said to Moses Was there no restingplace for the dead in Egypt that you have taken us away to come to our death in the waste land why have you taken us out of Egypt
Exo  Did we not say to you in Egypt Let us be as we are working for the Egyptians for it is better to be the servants of the Egyptians than to come to our death in the waste land
Exo  But Moses said Keep where you are and have no fear now you will see the salvation of the Lord which he will give you today for the Egyptians whom you see today you will never see again
Exo  The Lord will make war for you you have only to keep quiet
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Why are you crying out to me give the children of Israel the order to go forward
Exo  And let your rod be lifted up and your hand stretched out over the sea and it will be parted in two and the children of Israel will go through on dry land
Exo  And I will make the heart of the Egyptians hard and they will go in after them and I will be honoured over Pharaoh and over his army his warcarriages and his horsemen
Exo  And the Egyptians will see that I am the Lord when I get honour over Pharaoh and his warcarriages and his horsemen
Exo  Then the angel of God who had been before the tents of Israel took his place at their back and the pillar of cloud moving from before them came to rest at their back
Exo  And it came between the army of Egypt and the army of Israel and there was a dark cloud between them and they went on through the night but the one army came no nearer to the other all the night
Exo  And when Moses hand was stretched out over the sea the Lord with a strong east wind made the sea go back all night and the waters were parted in two and the sea became dry land
Exo  And the children of Israel went through the sea on dry land and the waters were a wall on their right side and on their left
Exo  Then the Egyptians went after them into the middle of the sea all Pharaohs horses and his warcarriages and his horsemen
Exo  And in the morning watch the Lord looking out on the armies of the Egyptians from the pillar of fire and cloud sent trouble on the army of the Egyptians
Exo  And made the wheels of their warcarriages stiff so that they had hard work driving them so the Egyptians said Let us go in flight from before the face of Israel for the Lord is fighting for them against the Egyptians
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Let your hand be stretched out over the sea and the waters will come back again on the Egyptians and on their warcarriages and on their horsemen
Exo  And when Moses hand was stretched out over the sea at dawn the sea came flowing back meeting the Egyptians in their flight and the Lord sent destruction on the Egyptians in the middle of the sea
Exo  And the waters came back covering the warcarriages and the horsemen and all the army of Pharaoh which went after them into the middle of the sea not one of them was to be seen
Exo  But the children of Israel went through the sea walking on dry land and the waters were a wall on their right side and on their left
Exo  So that day the Lord gave Israel salvation from the hands of the Egyptians and Israel saw the Egyptians dead on the seas edge
Exo  And Israel saw the great work which the Lord had done against the Egyptians and the fear of the Lord came on the people and they had faith in the Lord and in his servant Moses
Exo  Then Moses and the children of Israel made this song to the Lord and said I will make a song to the Lord for he is lifted up in glory the horse and the horseman he has sent down into the sea
Exo  The Lord is my strength and my strong helper he has become my salvation he is my God and I will give him praise my fathers God and I will give him glory
Exo  The Lord is a man of war the Lord is his name
Exo  Pharaohs warcarriages and his army he has sent down into the sea the best of his captains have gone down into the Red Sea
Exo  They were covered by the deep waters like a stone they went down under the waves
Exo  Full of glory O Lord is the power of your right hand by your right hand those who came against you are broken
Exo  When you are lifted up in power all those who come against you are crushed when you send out your wrath they are burned up like dry grass
Exo  By your breath the waves were massed together the flowing waters were lifted up like a pillar the deep waters became solid in the heart of the sea
Exo  Egypt said I will go after them I will overtake I will make division of their goods my desire will have its way with them my sword will be uncovered my hand will send destruction on them
Exo  You sent your wind and the sea came over them they went down like lead into the great waters
Exo  Who is like you O Lord among the gods who is like you in holy glory to be praised with fear doing wonders
Exo  When your right hand was stretched out the mouth of the earth was open for them
Exo  In your mercy you went before the people whom you have made yours guiding them in your strength to your holy place
Exo  Hearing of you the peoples were shaking in fear the people of Philistia were gripped with pain
Exo  The chiefs of Edom were troubled in heart the strong men of Moab were in the grip of fear all the people of Canaan became like water
Exo  Fear and grief came on them by the strength of your arm they were turned to stone till your people went over O Lord till the people went over whom you have made yours
Exo  You will take them in planting them in the mountain of your heritage the place O Lord where you have made your house the holy place O Lord the building of your hands
Exo  The Lord is King for ever and ever
Exo  For the horses of Pharaoh with his warcarriages and his horsemen went into the sea and the Lord sent the waters of the sea back over them but the children of Israel went through the sea on dry land
Exo  And Miriam the woman prophet the sister of Aaron took an instrument of music in her hand and all the women went after her with music and dances
Exo  And Miriam answering said Make a song to the Lord for he is lifted up in glory the horse and the horseman he has sent into the sea
Exo  Then Moses took Israel forward from the Red Sea and they went out into the waste land of Shur and for three days they were in the waste land where there was no water
Exo  And when they came to Marah the water was no good for drinking for the waters of Marah were bitter which is why it was named Marah
Exo  And the people crying out against Moses said What are we to have for drink
Exo  And in answer to his prayer the Lord made him see a tree and when he put it into the water the water was made sweet There he gave them a law and an order testing them
Exo  And he said If with all your heart you will give attention to the voice of the Lord your God and do what is right in his eyes giving ear to his orders and keeping his laws I will not put on you any of the diseases which I put on the Egyptians for I am the Lord your lifegiver
Exo  And they came to Elim where there were twelve watersprings and seventy palmtrees and they put up their tents there by the waters
Exo  And they went on their way from Elim and all the children of Israel came into the waste land of Sin which is between Elim and Sinai on the fifteenth day of the second month after they went out of the land of Egypt
Exo  And all the children of Israel were crying out against Moses and Aaron in the waste land
Exo  And the children of Israel said to them It would have been better for the Lord to have put us to death in the land of Egypt where we were seated by the fleshpots and had bread enough for our needs for you have taken us out to this waste of sand to put all this people to death through need of food
Exo  Then the Lord said to Moses See I will send down bread from heaven for you and the people will go out every day and get enough for the days needs so that I may put them to the test to see if they will keep my laws or not
Exo  And on the sixth day they are to make ready what they get in and it will be twice as much as they get on the other days
Exo  And Moses and Aaron said to all the children of Israel This evening it will be clear to you that it is the Lord who has taken you out of the land of Egypt
Exo  And in the morning you will see the glory of the Lord for your angry words against the Lord have come to his ears and what are we that you are crying out against us
Exo  And Moses said The Lord will give you meat for your food at evening and in the morning bread in full measure for your outcry against the Lord has come to his ears for what are we your outcry is not against us but against the Lord
Exo  And Moses said to Aaron Say to all the people of Israel Come near before the Lord for he has given ear to your outcry
Exo  And while Aaron was talking to the children of Israel their eyes were turned in the direction of the waste land and they saw the glory of the Lord shining in the cloud
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  The outcry of the children of Israel has come to my ears say to them now At nightfall you will have meat for your food and in the morning bread in full measure and you will see that I am the Lord your God
Exo  And it came about that in the evening little birds came up and the place was covered with them and in the morning there was dew all round about the tents
Exo  And when the dew was gone on the face of the earth was a small round thing like small drops of ice on the earth
Exo  And when the children of Israel saw it they said to one another What is it for they had no idea what it was And Moses said to them It is the bread which the Lord has given you for your food
Exo  This is what the Lord has said Let every man take up as much as he has need of at the rate of one omer for every person let every man take as much as is needed for his family
Exo  And the children of Israel did so and some took more and some less
Exo  And when it was measured he who had taken up much had nothing over and he who had little had enough every man had taken what he was able to make use of
Exo  And Moses said to them Let nothing be kept till the morning
Exo  But they gave no attention to Moses and some of them kept it till the morning and there were worms in it and it had an evil smell and Moses was angry with them
Exo  And they took it up morning by morning every man as he had need and when the sun was high it was gone
Exo  And on the sixth day they took up twice as much of the bread two omers for every person and all the rulers of the people gave Moses word of it
Exo  And he said This is what the Lord has said Tomorrow is a day of rest a holy Sabbath to the Lord what has to be cooked may be cooked and what is over put on one side to be kept till the morning
Exo  And they kept it till the morning as Moses had said and no smell came from it and it had no worms
Exo  And Moses said Make your meal today of what you have for this day is a Sabbath to the Lord today you will not get any in the fields
Exo  For six days you will get it but on the seventh day the Sabbath there will not be any
Exo  But still on the seventh day some of the people went out to get it and there was not any
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses How long will you go against my orders and my laws
Exo  See because the Lord has given you the Sabbath he gives you on the sixth day bread enough for two days let every man keep where he is let no man go out of his place on the seventh day
Exo  So the people took their rest on the seventh day
Exo  And this bread was named manna by Israel it was white like a grain seed and its taste was like cakes made with honey
Exo  And Moses said This is the order which the Lord has given Let one omer of it be kept for future generations so that they may see the bread which I gave you for your food in the waste land when I took you out from the land of Egypt
Exo  And Moses said to Aaron Take a pot and put one omer of manna in it and put it away before the Lord to be kept for future generations
Exo  So Aaron put it away in front of the holy chest to be kept as the Lord gave orders to Moses
Exo  And the children of Israel had manna for their food for forty years till they came to a land with people in it till they came to the edge of the land of Canaan
Exo  Now an omer is the tenth part of an ephah
Exo  And the children of Israel went on from the waste land of Sin by stages as the Lord gave them orders and put up their tents in Rephidim and there was no drinkingwater for the people
Exo  So the people were angry with Moses and said Give us water for drinking And Moses said Why are you angry with me and why do you put God to the test
Exo  And the people were in great need of water and they made an outcry against Moses and said Why have you taken us out of Egypt to send death on us and our children and our cattle through need of water
Exo  And Moses crying out to the Lord said What am I to do to this people they are almost ready to put me to death by stoning
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Go on before the people and take some of the chiefs of Israel with you and take in your hand the rod which was stretched out over the Nile and go
Exo  See I will take my place before you on the rock in Horeb and when you give the rock a blow water will come out of it and the people will have drink And Moses did so before the eyes of the chiefs of Israel
Exo  And he gave that place the name Massah and Meribah because the children of Israel were angry and because they put the Lord to the test saying Is the Lord with us or not
Exo  Then Amalek came and made war on Israel in Rephidim
Exo  And Moses said to Joshua Get together a band of men for us and go out make war on Amalek tomorrow I will take my place on the top of the hill with the rod of God in my hand
Exo  So Joshua did as Moses said to him and went to war with Amalek and Moses Aaron and Hur went up to the top of the hill
Exo  Now while Moses hand was lifted up Israel was the stronger but when he let his hand go down Amalek became the stronger
Exo  But Moses hands became tired so they put a stone under him and he took his seat on it Aaron and Hur supporting his hands one on one side and one on the other so his hands were kept up without falling till the sun went down
Exo  And Joshua overcame Amalek and his people with the sword
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Make a record of this in a book so that it may be kept in memory and say it again in the ears of Joshua that all memory of Amalek is to be completely uprooted from the earth
Exo  Then Moses put up an altar and gave it the name of Yahwehnissi
Exo  For he said The Lord has taken his oath that there will be war with Amalek from generation to generation
Exo  Now news came to Jethro the priest of Midian Moses fatherinlaw of all God had done for Moses and for Israel his people and how the Lord had taken Israel out of Egypt
Exo  And Jethro Moses fatherinlaw took Zipporah Moses wife after he had sent her away
Exo  And her two sons one of whom was named Gershom for he said I have been living in a strange land
Exo  And the name of the other was Eliezer for he said The God of my father was my help and kept me safe from the sword of Pharaoh
Exo  And Jethro Moses fatherinlaw came with his sons and his wife to where Moses had put up his tent in the waste land by the mountain of God
Exo  And he said to Moses I your fatherinlaw have come to you with your wife and your two sons
Exo  And Moses went out to his fatherinlaw and went down on his face before him and gave him a kiss and they said to one another Are you well and they came into the tent
Exo  And Moses gave his fatherinlaw an account of all the Lord had done to Pharaoh and to the Egyptians because of Israel and of all the troubles which had come on them by the way and how the Lord had given them salvation
Exo  And Jethro was glad because the Lord had been good to Israel freeing them from the power of the Egyptians
Exo  And Jethro said Praise be to the Lord who has taken you out of the hand of Pharaoh and out of the hand of the Egyptians freeing the people from the yoke of the Egyptians
Exo  Now I am certain that the Lord is greater than all gods for he has overcome them in their pride
Exo  Then Jethro Moses fatherinlaw made a burned offering to God and Aaron came with the chiefs of Israel and had a meal with Moses fatherinlaw before God
Exo  Now on the day after Moses took his seat to give decisions for the people and the people were waiting before Moses from morning till evening
Exo  And when Moses fatherinlaw saw all he was doing he said What is this you are doing for the people why are you seated here by yourself with all the people waiting before you from morning till evening
Exo  And Moses said to his fatherinlaw Because the people come to me to get directions from God
Exo  And if they have any question between themselves they come to me and I am judge between a man and his neighbour and I give them the orders and laws of God
Exo  And Moses fatherinlaw said to him What you are doing is not good
Exo  Your strength and that of the people will be completely used up this work is more than you are able to do by yourself
Exo  Give ear now to my suggestion and may God be with you you are to be the peoples representative before God taking their causes to him
Exo  Teaching them his rules and his laws guiding them in the way they have to go and making clear to them the work they have to do
Exo  But for the rest take from among the people able men such as have the fear of God true men hating profits wrongly made and put such men over them to be captains of thousands captains of hundreds and of fifties and of tens
Exo  And let them be judges in the causes of the people at all times and let them put before you all important questions but in small things let them give decisions themselves in this way it will be less hard for you and they will take the weight off you
Exo  If you do this and God gives approval then you will be able to go on without weariness and all this people will go to their tents in peace
Exo  So Moses took note of the words of his fatherinlaw and did as he had said
Exo  And he made selection of able men out of all Israel and made them heads over the people captains of thousands captains of hundreds and of fifties and of tens
Exo  And they were judges in the causes of the people at all times the hard questions they put before Moses but on every small point they gave decisions themselves
Exo  And Moses let his fatherinlaw go away and he went back to his land
Exo  In the third month after the children of Israel went out from Egypt on the same day they came into the waste land of Sinai
Exo  And when they had gone away from Rephidim and had come into the waste land of Sinai they put up their tents in the waste land before the mountain there Israel put up its tents
Exo  And Moses went up to God and the voice of the Lord came to him from the mountain saying Say to the family of Jacob and give word to the children of Israel
Exo  You have seen what I did to the Egyptians and how I took you as on eagles wings guiding you to myself
Exo  If now you will truly give ear to my voice and keep my agreement you will be my special property out of all the peoples for all the earth is mine
Exo  And you will be a kingdom of priests to me and a holy nation These are the words which you are to say to the children of Israel
Exo  And Moses came and sent for the chiefs of the people and put before them all these words which the Lord had given him orders to say
Exo  And all the people answering together said Whatever the Lord has said we will do And Moses took back to the Lord the words of the people
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses See I will come to you in a thick cloud so that what I say to you may come to the ears of the people and they may have belief in you for ever And Moses gave the Lord word of what the people had said
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Go to the people and make them holy today and tomorrow and let their clothing be washed
Exo  And by the third day let them be ready for on the third day the Lord will come down on Mount Sinai before the eyes of all the people
Exo  And let limits be marked out for the people round the mountain and say to them Take care not to go up the mountain or near the sides of it whoever puts his foot on the mountain will certainly come to his death
Exo  He is not to be touched by a hand but is to be stoned or have an arrow put through him man or beast he is to be put to death at the long sounding of a horn they may come up to the mountain
Exo  Then Moses went down from the mountain to the people and made the people holy and their clothing was washed
Exo  And he said to the people Be ready by the third day do not come near a woman
Exo  And when morning came on the third day there were thunders and flames and a thick cloud on the mountain and a horn sounding very loud and all the people in the tents were shaking with fear
Exo  And Moses made the people come out of their tents and take their places before God and they came to the foot of the mountain
Exo  And all the mountain of Sinai was smoking for the Lord had come down on it in fire and the smoke of it went up like the smoke of a great burning and all the mountain was shaking
Exo  And when the sound of the horn became louder and louder Moses words were answered by the voice of God
Exo  Then the Lord came down on to Mount Sinai to the top of the mountain and the Lord sent for Moses to come up to the top of the mountain and Moses went up
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Go down and give the people orders to keep back for fear that a great number of them forcing their way through to see the Lord may come to destruction
Exo  And let the priests who come near to the Lord make themselves holy for fear that the Lord may come on them suddenly
Exo  And Moses said to the Lord The people will not be able to come up the mountain for you gave us orders to put limits round the mountain marking it out and making it holy
Exo  And the Lord said to him Go down and you and Aaron may come up but let not the priests and the people make their way through to the Lord or he will come on them suddenly
Exo  So Moses went down to the people and said this to them
Exo  And God said all these words
Exo  I am the Lord your God who took you out of the land of Egypt out of the prisonhouse
Exo  You are to have no other gods but me
Exo  You are not to make an image or picture of anything in heaven or on the earth or in the waters under the earth
Exo  You may not go down on your faces before them or give them worship for I the Lord your God am a God who will not give his honour to another and I will send punishment on the children for the wrongdoing of their fathers to the third and fourth generation of my haters
Exo  And I will have mercy through a thousand generations on those who have love for me and keep my laws
Exo  You are not to make use of the name of the Lord your God for an evil purpose whoever takes the Lords name on his lips for an evil purpose will be judged a sinner by the Lord
Exo  Keep in memory the Sabbath and let it be a holy day
Exo  On six days do all your work
Exo  But the seventh day is a Sabbath to the Lord your God on that day you are to do no work you or your son or your daughter your manservant or your womanservant your cattle or the man from a strange country who is living among you
Exo  For in six days the Lord made heaven and earth and the sea and everything in them and he took his rest on the seventh day for this reason the Lord has given his blessing to the seventh day and made it holy
Exo  Give honour to your father and to your mother so that your life may be long in the land which the Lord your God is giving you
Exo  Do not put anyone to death without cause
Exo  Do not be false to the married relation
Exo  Do not take the property of another
Exo  Do not give false witness against your neighbour
Exo  Let not your desire be turned to your neighbours house or his wife or his manservant or his womanservant or his ox or his ass or anything which is his
Exo  And all the people were watching the thunderings and the flames and the sound of the horn and the mountain smoking and when they saw it they kept far off shaking with fear
Exo  And they said to Moses To your words we will give ear but let not the voice of God come to our ears for fear death may come on us
Exo  And Moses said to the people Have no fear for God has come to put you to the test so that fearing him you may be kept from sin
Exo  And the people kept their places far off but Moses went near to the dark cloud where God was
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Say to the children of Israel You yourselves have seen that my voice has come to you from heaven
Exo  Gods of silver and gods of gold you are not to make for yourselves
Exo  Make for me an altar of earth offering on it your burned offerings and your peaceofferings your sheep and your oxen in every place where I have put the memory of my name I will come to you and give you my blessing
Exo  And if you make me an altar of stone do not make it of cut stones for the touch of an instrument will make it unclean
Exo  And do not go up by steps to my altar for fear that your bodies may be seen uncovered
Exo  Now these are the laws which you are to put before them
Exo  If you get a Hebrew servant for money he is to be your servant for six years and in the seventh year you are to let him go free without payment
Exo  If he comes to you by himself let him go away by himself if he is married let his wife go away with him
Exo  If his master gives him a wife and he gets sons or daughters by her the wife and her children will be the property of the master and the servant is to go away by himself
Exo  But if the servant says clearly My master and my wife and children are dear to me I have no desire to be free
Exo  Then his master is to take him to the gods of the house and at the door or at its framework he is to make a hole in his ear with a sharppointed instrument and he will be his servant for ever
Exo  And if a man gives his daughter for a price to be a servant she is not to go away free as the menservants do
Exo  If she is not pleasing to her master who has taken her for himself let a payment be made for her so that she may go free her master has no power to get a price for her and send her to a strange land because he has been false to her
Exo  And if he gives her to his son he is to do everything for her as if she was his daughter
Exo  And if he takes another woman her food and clothing and her married rights are not to be less
Exo  And if he does not do these three things for her she has the right to go free without payment
Exo  He who gives a man a deathblow is himself to be put to death
Exo  But if he had no evil purpose against him and God gave him into his hand I will give you a place to which he may go in flight
Exo  But if a man makes an attack on his neighbour on purpose to put him to death by deceit you are to take him from my altar and put him to death
Exo  Any man who gives a blow to his father or his mother is certainly to be put to death
Exo  Any man who gets another into his power in order to get a price for him is to be put to death if you take him in the act
Exo  Any man cursing his father or his mother is to be put to death
Exo  If in a fight one man gives another a blow with a stone or with the shut hand not causing his death but making him keep in bed
Exo  If he is able to get up again and go about with a stick the other will be let off only he will have to give him payment for the loss of his time and see that he is cared for till he is well
Exo  If a man gives his manservant or his womanservant blows with a rod causing death he is certainly to undergo punishment
Exo  But at the same time if the servant goes on living for a day or two the master is not to get punishment for the servant is his property
Exo  If men while fighting do damage to a woman with child causing the loss of the child but no other evil comes to her the man will have to make payment up to the amount fixed by her husband in agreement with the decision of the judges
Exo  But if damage comes to her let life be given in payment for life
Exo  Eye for eye tooth for tooth hand for hand foot for foot
Exo  Burning for burning wound for wound blow for blow
Exo  If a man gives his manservant or his womanservant a blow in the eye causing its destruction he is to let him go free on account of the damage to his eye
Exo  Or if the loss of a tooth is caused by his blow he will let him go free on account of his tooth
Exo  If an ox comes to be the cause of death to a man or a woman the ox is to be stoned and its flesh may not be used for food but the owner will not be judged responsible
Exo  But if the ox has frequently done such damage in the past and the owner has had word of it and has not kept it under control so that it has been the cause of the death of a man or woman not only is the ox to be stoned but its owner is to be put to death
Exo  If a price is put on his life let him make payment of whatever price is fixed
Exo  If the death of a son or of a daughter has been caused the punishment is to be in agreement with this rule
Exo  If the death of a manservant or of a womanservant is caused by the ox the owner is to give their master thirty shekels of silver and the ox is to be stoned
Exo  If a man makes a hole in the earth without covering it up and an ox or an ass dropping into it comes to its death
Exo  The owner of the hole is responsible he will have to make payment to their owner but the dead beast will be his
Exo  And if one mans ox does damage to another mans ox causing its death then the living ox is to be exchanged for money and division made of the price of it and of the price of the dead one
Exo  But if it is common knowledge that the ox has frequently done such damage in the past and its owner has not kept it under control he will have to give ox for ox and the dead beast will be his
Exo  If a man takes without right another mans ox or his sheep and puts it to death or gets a price for it he is to give five oxen for an ox or four sheep for a sheep in payment the thief will have to make payment for what he has taken if he has no money he himself will have to be exchanged for money so that payment may be made
Exo  If a thief is taken in the act of forcing his way into a house and his death is caused by a blow the owner of the house is not responsible for his blood
Exo  But if it is after dawn he will be responsible
Exo  If he still has what he had taken whatever it is ox or ass or sheep he is to give twice its value
Exo  If a man makes a fire in a field or a vinegarden and lets the fire do damage to another mans field he is to give of the best produce of his field or his vinegarden to make up for it
Exo  If there is a fire and the flames get to the thorns at the edge of the field causing destruction of the cut grain or of the living grain or of the field he who made the fire will have to make up for the damage
Exo  If a man puts money or goods in the care of his neighbour to keep for him and it is taken from the mans house if they get the thief he will have to make payment of twice the value
Exo  If they do not get the thief let the master of the house come before the judges and take an oath that he has not put his hand on his neighbours goods
Exo  In any question about an ox or an ass or a sheep or clothing or about the loss of any property which anyone says is his let the two sides put their cause before God and he who is judged to be in the wrong is to make payment to his neighbour of twice the value
Exo  If a man puts an ass or an ox or a sheep or any beast into the keeping of his neighbour and it comes to death or is damaged or is taken away without any person seeing it
Exo  If he takes his oath before the Lord that he has not put his hand to his neighbours goods the owner is to take his word for it and he will not have to make payment for it
Exo  But if it is taken from him by a thief he is to make up for the loss of it to its owner
Exo  But if it has been damaged by a beast and he is able to make this clear he will not have to make payment for what was damaged
Exo  If a man gets from his neighbour the use of one of his beasts and it is damaged or put to death when the owner is not with it he will certainly have to make payment for the loss
Exo  If the owner is with it he will not have to make payment if he gave money for the use of it the loss is covered by the payment
Exo  If a man takes a virgin who has not given her word to another man and has connection with her he will have to give a brideprice for her to be his wife
Exo  If her father will not give her to him on any account he will have to give the regular payment for virgins
Exo  Any woman using unnatural powers or secret arts is to be put to death
Exo  Any man who has sex connection with a beast is to be put to death
Exo  Complete destruction will come on any man who makes offerings to any other god but the Lord
Exo  Do no wrong to a man from a strange country and do not be hard on him for you yourselves were living in a strange country in the land of Egypt
Exo  Do no wrong to a widow or to a child whose father is dead
Exo  If you are cruel to them in any way and their cry comes up to me I will certainly give ear
Exo  And in the heat of my wrath I will put you to death with the sword so that your wives will be widows and your children without fathers
Exo  If you let any of the poor among my people have the use of your money do not be a hard creditor to him and do not take interest
Exo  If ever you take your neighbours clothing in exchange for the use of your money let him have it back before the sun goes down
Exo  For it is the only thing he has for covering his skin what is he to go to sleep in and when his cry comes up to me I will give ear for my mercy is great
Exo  You may not say evil of the judges or put a curse on the ruler of your people
Exo  Do not keep back your offerings from the wealth of your grain and your vines The first of your sons you are to give to me
Exo  In the same way with your oxen and your sheep for seven days let the young one be with its mother on the eighth day give it to me
Exo  You are to be holy men to me the flesh of no animal whose death has been caused by the beasts of the field may be used for your food it is to be given to the dogs
Exo  Do not let a false statement go further do not make an agreement with evildoers to be a false witness
Exo  Do not be moved to do wrong by the general opinion or give the support of your words to a wrong decision
Exo  But on the other hand do not be turned from what is right in order to give support to a poor mans cause
Exo  If you come across the ox or the ass of one who is no friend to you wandering from its way you are to take it back to him
Exo  If you see the ass of one who has no love for you bent down to the earth under the weight which is put on it you are to come to its help even against your desire
Exo  Let no wrong decisions be given in the poor mans cause
Exo  Keep yourselves far from any false business never let the upright or him who has done no wrong be put to death for I will make the evildoer responsible for his sin
Exo  Take no rewards in a cause for rewards make blind those who have eyes to see and make the decisions of the upright false
Exo  Do not be hard on the man from a strange country who is living among you for you have had experience of the feelings of one who is far from the land of his birth because you yourselves were living in Egypt in a strange land
Exo  For six years put seed into your fields and get in the increase
Exo  But in the seventh year let the land have a rest and be unplanted so that the poor may have food from it and let the beasts of the field take the rest Do the same with your vinegardens and your olivetrees
Exo  For six days do your work and on the seventh day keep the Sabbath so that your ox and your ass may have rest together with the son of your servant and the man from a strange land living among you
Exo  Take note of all these things which I have said to you and let not the names of other gods come into your minds or from your lips
Exo  Three times in the year you are to keep a feast to me
Exo  You are to keep the feast of unleavened bread for seven days let your bread be without leaven as I gave you orders at the regular time in the month Abib for in it you came out of Egypt and let no one come before me without an offering
Exo  And the feast of the graincutting the firstfruits of your planted fields and the feast at the start of the year when you have got in all the fruit from your fields
Exo  Three times in the year let all your males come before the Lord God
Exo  Do not give the blood of my offering with leavened bread and do not let the fat of my feast be kept all night till the morning
Exo  The best of the firstfruits of your land are to be taken into the house of the Lord your God The young goat is not to be cooked in its mothers milk
Exo  See I am sending an angel before you to keep you on your way and to be your guide into the place which I have made ready for you
Exo  Give attention to him and give ear to his voice do not go against him for your wrongdoing will not be overlooked by him because my name is in him
Exo  But if you truly give ear to his voice and do whatever I say then I will be against those who are against you fighting those who are fighting you
Exo  And my angel will go before you guiding you into the land of the Amorite and the Hittite and the Perizzite and the Canaanite and the Hivite and the Jebusite and they will be cut off by my hand
Exo  Do not go down on your faces and give worship to their gods or do as they do but overcome them completely and let their pillars be broken down
Exo  And give worship to the Lord your God who will send his blessing on your bread and on your water and I will take all disease away from among you
Exo  All your animals will give birth without loss not one will be without young in all your land I will give you a full measure of life
Exo  I will send my fear before you putting to flight all the people to whom you come all those who are against you will go in flight turning their backs before you
Exo  I will send hornets before you driving out the Hivite and the Canaanite and the Hittite before your face
Exo  I will not send them all out in one year for fear that their land may become waste and the beasts of the field be increased overmuch against you
Exo  Little by little I will send them away before you till your numbers are increased and you take up your heritage in the land
Exo  I will let the limits of your land be from the Red Sea to the sea of the Philistines and from the waste land to the river Euphrates for I will give the people of those lands into your power and you will send them out before you
Exo  Make no agreement with them or with their gods
Exo  Let them not go on living in your land or they will make you do evil against me for if you give worship to their gods it will certainly be a cause of sin to you
Exo  And he said to Moses Come up to the Lord you and Aaron and Nadab and Abihu and seventy of the chiefs of Israel and give me worship from a distance
Exo  And Moses only may come near to the Lord but the others are not to come near and the people may not come up with them
Exo  Then Moses came and put before the people all the words of the Lord and his laws and all the people answering with one voice said Whatever the Lord has said we will do
Exo  Then Moses put down in writing all the words of the Lord and he got up early in the morning and made an altar at the foot of the mountain with twelve pillars for the twelve tribes of Israel
Exo  And he sent some of the young men of the children of Israel to make burned offerings and peaceofferings of oxen to the Lord
Exo  And Moses took half the blood and put it in basins draining out half of the blood over the altar
Exo  And he took the book of the agreement reading it in the hearing of the people and they said Everything which the Lord has said we will do and we will keep his laws
Exo  Then Moses took the blood and let it come on the people and said This blood is the sign of the agreement which the Lord has made with you in these words
Exo  Then Moses and Aaron Nadab and Abihu and seventy of the chiefs of Israel went up
Exo  And they saw the God of Israel and under his feet there was as it seemed a jewelled floor clear as the heavens
Exo  And he put not his hand on the chiefs of the children of Israel they saw God and took food and drink
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Come up to me on the mountain and take your place there and I will give you the stones on which I have put in writing the law and the orders so that you may give the people knowledge of them
Exo  Then Moses and Joshua his servant got up and Moses went up into the mountain of God
Exo  And he said to the chiefs Keep your places here till we come back to you Aaron and Hur are with you if anyone has any cause let him go to them
Exo  And Moses went up into the mountain and it was covered by the cloud
Exo  And the glory of the Lord was resting on Mount Sinai and the cloud was over it for six days and on the seventh day he said Moses name out of the cloud
Exo  And the glory of the Lord was like a flame on the top of the mountain before the eyes of the children of Israel
Exo  And Moses went up the mountain into the cloud and was there for forty days and forty nights
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  Say to the children of Israel that they are to make me an offering from every man who has the impulse in his heart take an offering for me
Exo  And this is the offering you are to take from them gold and silver and brass
Exo  And blue and purple and red and the best linen and goats hair
Exo  And sheepskins coloured red and leather and hard wood
Exo  Oil for the light spices for the sweetsmelling oil sweet perfumes for burning
Exo  Beryls and stones of value to be put on the ephod and on the priests bag
Exo  And let them make me a holy place so that I may be ever present among them
Exo  Make the House and everything in it from the designs which I will give you
Exo  And they are to make an ark of hard wood two and a half cubits long and a cubit and a half wide and high
Exo  It is to be plated inside and out with the best gold with an edge of gold all round it
Exo  And make four rings of gold for it to be fixed on its four feet two rings on one side of it and two on the other
Exo  And make rods of the same wood plating them with gold
Exo  And put the rods through the rings at the sides of the ark for lifting it
Exo  The rods are to be kept in the rings and never taken out
