Exo  Inside the ark you are to put the record which I will give you
Exo  And you are to make a cover of the best gold two and a half cubits long and a cubit and a half wide
Exo  And at the two ends of the cover you are to make two winged ones of hammered gold
Exo  One at one end and one at the other the winged ones are to be part of the cover
Exo  And their wings are to be outstretched over the cover and the winged ones are to be opposite one another facing the cover
Exo  And put the cover over the ark and in the ark the record which I will give you
Exo  And there between the two winged ones on the cover of the ark I will come to you face to face and make clear to you all the orders I have to give you for the children of Israel
Exo  And you are to make a table of the same wood two cubits long a cubit wide and a cubit and a half high
Exo  Plated with the best gold with a gold edge all round it
Exo  And make a frame all round it as wide as a mans hand with a gold edge to the frame
Exo  And make four gold rings and put them at the four angles on the four feet of the table
Exo  The rings are to be fixed under the frame to take the rods with which the table is to be lifted
Exo  Make rods of the same wood plated with gold for lifting the table
Exo  And make the tablevessels the spoons and the cups and the basins for liquids all of the best gold
Exo  And on the table at all times you are to keep my holy bread
Exo  And you are to make a support for lights of the best gold its base and its pillar are to be of hammered gold its cups its buds and its flowers are to be made of the same metal
Exo  It is to have six branches coming out from its sides three branches from one side and three from the other
Exo  Every branch having three cups made like almond flowers every cup with a bud and a flower on all the branches
Exo  And on the pillar four cups like almond flowers every one with its bud and its flower
Exo  And under every two branches a bud made with the branch for all the six branches of it
Exo  The buds and the branches are to be made of the same metal all together one complete work of hammered gold
Exo  Then you are to make its seven vessels for the lights putting them in their place so that they give light in front of it
Exo  And the instruments and trays for use with it are all to be of the best gold
Exo  A talent of gold will be needed for it with all these vessels
Exo  And see that you make them from the design which you saw on the mountain
Exo  And you are to make a House for me with ten curtains of the best linen blue and purple and red worked with designs of winged ones by a good workman
Exo  Every curtain is to be twentyeight cubits long and four cubits wide all of the same measure
Exo  Five curtains are to be joined together and the other five are to be joined together
Exo  And you are to put twists of blue cord on the edge of the outside curtain of the first group of five and on the edge of the outside curtain of the second group of five
Exo  Fifty twists on one curtain and fifty on the other the twists to be opposite one another
Exo  Then make fifty gold hooks joining the curtains together by the hooks and in this way the House will be made
Exo  And you are to make curtains of goats hair for a tent over the House eleven curtains
Exo  Every curtain is to be thirty cubits long and four cubits wide all of the same measure
Exo  Five of these curtains are to be joined together and the other six are to be joined together the sixth being folded over to make a hanging in front of the tent
Exo  And you are to put fifty twists of cord on the edge of the outside curtain of one group and fifty twists on the edge of the outside curtain of the other group
Exo  Then make fifty brass hooks and put the hooks into the twists joining the tent together to make it one
Exo  And the folded part which is over of the curtains of the tent the halfcurtain which is folded back will be hanging down over the back of the House
Exo  And the cubit which is over of the ten curtains at the sides will be hanging over the two sides of the House as a cover
Exo  And then you are to make a cover for the tent of sheepskins coloured red and a cover of leather over that
Exo  And you are to make upright boards of hard wood for the House
Exo  Every board is to be ten cubits high and a cubit and a half wide
Exo  Every board is to be joined to the one nearest to it by two tongues and so for every board in the House
Exo  These are the boards needed for the house twenty boards for the south side
Exo  With forty silver bases under the twenty boards two bases under every board to take its tongues
Exo  And twenty boards for the second side of the house on the north
Exo  With their forty silver bases two under every board
Exo  And six boards for the back of the House on the west
Exo  With two boards for the angles of the House at the back
Exo  The two are to be joined together at the base and at the top to one ring forming the two angles
Exo  So there are to be eight boards with their sixteen silver bases two bases under every board
Exo  And make rods of the same wood five for the boards on the one side
Exo  And five for the boards on the other side of the House and five for the west side of the House at the back
Exo  And the middle rod is to go through the rings of all the boards from end to end
Exo  And the boards are to be plated with gold having gold rings for the rods to go through and the rods are to be plated with gold
Exo  And you are to make the House from the design which you saw on the mountain
Exo  And you are to make a veil of the best linen blue and purple and red worked with designs of winged ones by a good workman
Exo  Hanging it by gold hooks from four pillars of wood plated with gold and fixed in silver bases
Exo  And you are to put up the veil under the hooks and put inside it the ark of the law the veil is to be a division between the holy place and the most holy
Exo  You are to put the cover on the ark of the law inside the most holy place
Exo  And outside the veil you are to put the table and the support for the lights opposite the table on the south side of the House and the table is to be on the north side
Exo  And you are to make a curtain for the doorway of the Tent of the best linen with needlework of blue and purple and red
Exo  And make five pillars for the curtain of hard wood plated with gold their hooks are to be of gold and their bases of brass
Exo  And make an altar of hard wood a square altar five cubits long five cubits wide and three cubits high
Exo  Put horns at the four angles of it made of the same plating it all with brass
Exo  And make all its vessels the baskets for taking away the dust of the fire the spades and basins and meathooks and firetrays of brass
Exo  And make a network of brass with four brass rings at its four angles
Exo  And put the network under the shelf round the altar so that the net comes halfway up the altar
Exo  And make rods for the altar of hard wood plated with brass
Exo  And put the rods through the rings at the two opposite sides of the altar for lifting it
Exo  The altar is to be hollow boarded in with wood make it from the design which you saw on the mountain
Exo  And let there be an open space round the House with hangings for its south side of the best linen a hundred cubits long
Exo  Their twenty pillars and their twenty bases are to be of brass the hooks of the pillars and their bands are to be of silver
Exo  And on the north side in the same way hangings a hundred cubits long with twenty pillars of brass on bases of brass their hooks and their bands are to be of silver
Exo  And for the open space on the west side the hangings are to be fifty cubits wide with ten pillars and ten bases
Exo  And on the east side the space is to be fifty cubits wide
Exo  On the one side of the doorway will be hangings fifteen cubits long with three pillars and three bases
Exo  And on the other side hangings fifteen cubits long with three pillars and three bases
Exo  And across the doorway a veil of twenty cubits of the best linen made of needlework of blue and purple and red with four pillars and four bases
Exo  All the pillars round the open space are to have silver bands with hooks of silver and bases of brass
Exo  The open space is to be a hundred cubits long fifty cubits wide with sides five cubits high curtained with the best linen with bases of brass
Exo  All the instruments for the work of the House and all its nails and the nails of the open space are to be of brass
Exo  Give orders to the children of Israel to give you clear olive oil for the lights so that a light may be burning there at all times
Exo  Let Aaron and his sons put this in order evening and morning before the Lord inside the Tent of meeting outside the veil which is before the ark this is to be an order for ever from generation to generation to be kept by the children of Israel
Exo  Now let Aaron your brother and his sons with him come near from among the children of Israel so that they may be my priests even Aaron and Nadab Abihu Eleazar and Ithamar his sons
Exo  And make holy robes for Aaron your brother so that he may be clothed with glory and honour
Exo  Give orders to all the wisehearted workmen whom I have made full of the spirit of wisdom to make robes for Aaron so that he may be made holy as my priest
Exo  This is what they are to make a priests bag an ephod and a robe and a coat of coloured needlework a headdress and a linen band they are to make holy robes for Aaron your brother and for his sons so that they may do the work of priests for me
Exo  They are to take the gold and blue and purple and red and the best linen
Exo  And make the ephod of gold and blue and purple and red and the best linen the work of a designer
Exo  It is to have two bands stitched to it at the top of the arms joining it together
Exo  And the beautifully worked band which goes on it is to be of the same work and the same material of gold and blue and purple and red and twisted linenwork
Exo  You are to take two beryl stones on which the names of the children of Israel are to be cut
Exo  Six names on the one stone and six on the other in the order of their birth
Exo  With the work of a jeweller like the cutting of a stamp the names of the children of Israel are to be cut on them and they are to be fixed in twisted frames of gold
Exo  And the two stones are to be placed on the ephod over the armholes to be stones of memory for the children of Israel Aaron will have their names on his arms when he goes in before the Lord to keep the Lord in mind of them
Exo  And you are to make twisted frames of gold
Exo  And two chains of the best gold twisted like cords and have the chains fixed on to the frames
Exo  And make a priests bag for giving decisions designed like the ephod made of gold and blue and purple and red and the best linen
Exo  It is to be square folded in two a handstretch long and a handstretch wide
Exo  And on it you are to put four lines of jewels the first line is to be a cornelian a chrysolite and an emerald
Exo  The second a ruby a sapphire and an onyx
Exo  The third a jacinth an agate and an amethyst
Exo  The fourth a topaz a beryl and a jasper they are to be fixed in twisted frames of gold
Exo  The jewels are to be twelve in number for the names of the children of Israel every jewel having the name of one of the twelve tribes cut on it as on a stamp
Exo  And you are to make two chains of gold twisted like cords to be fixed to the priests bag
Exo  And put two gold rings on the two ends of the bag
Exo  Put the two gold chains on the two rings at the ends of the bag
Exo  Joining the other ends of the chains to the gold frames and putting them on the front of the ephod at the top of the arms
Exo  Then make two gold rings and put them on the lower ends of the bag at the edge of it on the inner side nearest to the ephod
Exo  And make two more gold rings and put them on the front of the ephod at the top of the arms at the join over the worked band
Exo  So that the rings on the bag may be fixed to the rings of the ephod by a blue cord and on to the band of the ephod so that the bag may not come loose from the ephod
Exo  And so Aaron will have the names of the children of Israel on the priests bag over his heart whenever he goes into the holy place to keep the memory of them before the Lord
Exo  And in the bag you are to put the Urim and Thummim so that they may be on Aarons heart whenever he goes in before the Lord and Aaron may have the power of making decisions for the children of Israel before the Lord at all times
Exo  The robe which goes with the ephod is to be made all of blue
Exo  With a hole at the top in the middle of it the hole is to be edged with a band to make it strong like the hole in the coat of a fightingman so that it may not be broken open
Exo  And round the skirts of it put fruits in blue and purple and red with bells of gold between
Exo  A gold bell and a fruit in turn all round the skirts of the robe
Exo  Aaron is to put it on for his holy work and the sound of it will be clear when he goes into the holy place before the Lord and when he comes out keeping him safe from death
Exo  You are to make a plate of the best gold cutting on it as on a stamp these words HOLY TO THE LORD
Exo  Put a blue cord on it and put it on the front of the twisted headdress
Exo  And it will be over Aarons brow so that Aaron will be responsible for any error in all the holy offerings made by the children of Israel it will be on his brow at all times so that their offerings may be pleasing to the Lord
Exo  The coat is to be made of the best linen worked in squares and you are to make a headdress of linen and a linen band worked in needlework
Exo  And for Aarons sons you are to make coats and bands and headdresses so that they may be clothed with glory and honour
Exo  These you are to put on Aaron your brother and on his sons putting oil on them separating them and making them holy to do the work of priests to me
Exo  And you are to make them linen trousers covering their bodies from the middle to the knee
Exo  Aaron and his sons are to put these on whenever they go into the Tent of meeting or come near the altar when they are doing the work of the holy place so that they may be free from any sin causing death this is to be an order for him and his seed after him for ever
Exo  This is what you are to do to make them holy to do the work of priests to me Take one young ox and two male sheep without any mark on them
Exo  And unleavened bread and unleavened cakes mixed with oil and thin unleavened cakes on which oil has been put made of the best breadmeal
Exo  Put these in a basket and take them with the ox and the two sheep
Exo  And let Aaron and his sons come to the door of the Tent of meeting and there let them be washed with water
Exo  Take the robes and put the coat and the dress and the ephod and the priests bag on Aaron put the band of needlework round him
Exo  And let the headdress be placed on his head and the holy crown on the headdress
Exo  Then take the oil and put it on his head
Exo  And take his sons and put their robes on them
Exo  And put the linen bands round Aaron and his sons and the headdresses on them to make them priests by my order for ever so you are to make Aaron and his sons holy to me
Exo  Then let the ox be taken in front of the Tent of meeting and let Aaron and his sons put their hands on its head
Exo  And you are to put the ox to death before the Lord at the door of the Tent of meeting
Exo  Then take some of the blood of the ox and put it on the horns of the altar with your finger draining out all the rest of the blood at the base of the altar
Exo  And take all the fat covering the inside of the ox and the fat joining the liver and the two kidneys with the fat round them and let them be burned on the altar
Exo  But the flesh of the ox and its skin and its waste parts are to be burned outside the circle of the tents for it is a sinoffering
Exo  Then take one of the sheep and let Aaron and his sons put their hands on its head
Exo  Then let it be put to death so that the sides of the altar are marked with its blood
Exo  Then the sheep is to be cut up into its parts and after washing its legs and its inside parts you are to put them with the parts and the head
Exo  And let them all be burned on the altar as a burned offering to the Lord a sweet smell an offering made by fire to the Lord
Exo  Then take the other sheep and after Aaron and his sons have put their hands on its head
Exo  You are to put the sheep to death and take some of its blood and put it on the point of Aarons right ear and of the right ears of his sons and on the thumbs of their right hands and the great toes of their right feet dropping the rest of the blood on the sides of the altar
Exo  Then take some of the blood on the altar and the oil and put it on Aaron and his robes and on his sons and on their robes so that he and his robes and his sons and their robes may be made holy
Exo  Then take the fat of the sheep the fat tail the fat covering the insides and the fat joining the liver and the two kidneys with the fat round them and the right leg for by the offering of this sheep they are to be marked out as priests
Exo  And take one bit of bread and one cake of oiled bread and one thin cake out of the basket of unleavened bread which is before the Lord
Exo  And put them all on the hands of Aaron and of his sons to be waved for a wave offering before the Lord
Exo  Then take them from their hands and let them be burned on the burned offering on the altar a sweet smell before the Lord an offering made by fire to the Lord
Exo  Then take the breast of Aarons sheep waving it before the Lord and it is to be your part of the offering
Exo  So you are to make holy the breast of the sheep which is waved and the leg which is lifted up on high that is of the sheep which is offered for Aaron and his sons
Exo  And it will be their part as a right for ever from the children of Israel it is a special offering from the children of Israel made from their peaceofferings a special offering lifted up to the Lord
Exo  And Aarons holy robes will be used by his sons after him they will put them on when they are made priests
Exo  For seven days the son who becomes priest in his place will put them on when he comes into the Tent of meeting to do the work of the holy place
Exo  Then take the sheep of the wave offering and let its flesh be cooked in water in a holy place
Exo  And let Aaron and his sons make a meal of it with the bread in the basket at the door of the Tent of meeting
Exo  All those things which were used as offerings to take away sin and to make them holy to be priests they may have for food but no one who is not a priest may have them for they are holy food
Exo  And if any of the flesh of the offering or of the bread is over till the morning let it be burned with fire it is not to be used for food for it is holy
Exo  All these things you are to do to Aaron and his sons as I have given you orders for seven days the work of making them priests is to go on
Exo  Every day an ox is to be offered as a sinoffering to take away sins and by this offering on it you will make the altar clean from sin and you are to put oil on it and make it holy
Exo  For seven days you are to make offerings for the altar and make it holy so that it may become completely holy and anything touching it will become holy
Exo  Now this is the offering which you are to make on the altar two lambs in their first year every day regularly
Exo  One lamb is to be offered in the morning and the other in the evening
Exo  And with the one lamb a tenth part of an ephah of the best meal mixed with a fourth part of a hin of clear oil and the fourth part of a hin of wine for a drink offering
Exo  And the other lamb is to be offered in the evening and with it the same meal offering and drink offering for a sweet smell an offering made by fire to the Lord
Exo  This is to be a regular burned offering made from generation to generation at the door of the Tent of meeting before the Lord where I will come face to face with you and have talk with you
Exo  There I will come face to face with the children of Israel and the Tent will be made holy by my glory
Exo  I will make holy the Tent of meeting and the altar and Aaron and his sons I will make holy to be my priests
Exo  Among the children of Israel I will make my livingplace and I will be their God
Exo  And they will see that I am the Lord their God who took them out of the land of Egypt so that I might be ever with them I am the Lord their God
Exo  And you are to make an altar for the burning of perfume of hard wood let it be made
Exo  The altar is to be square a cubit long and a cubit wide and two cubits high and its horns are to be made of the same
Exo  It is to be plated with the best gold the top of it and the sides and the horns with an edging of gold all round it
Exo  Under the edge on the two opposite sides you are to make two gold rings to take the rods for lifting it
Exo  And make these rods of the same wood plating them with gold
Exo  And let it be placed in front of the veil before the ark of the law before the cover which is over the law where I will come face to face with you
Exo  And on this altar sweet spices are to be burned by Aaron every morning when he sees to the lights
Exo  And every evening when he puts the lights up in their places the spices are to be burned a sweetsmelling smoke going up before the Lord from generation to generation for ever
Exo  No strange perfume no burned offering or meal offering and no drink offering is to be offered on it
Exo  And once every year Aaron is to make its horns clean with the blood of the sinoffering he is to make it clean once every year from generation to generation it is most holy to the Lord
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  When you are taking the number of the children of Israel let every man who is numbered give to the Lord a price for his life so that no disease may come on them when they are numbered
Exo  And this is what they are to give let every man who is numbered give half a shekel by the scale of the holy place the shekel being valued at twenty gerahs this money is an offering to the Lord
Exo  Everyone who is numbered from twenty years old and over is to give an offering to the Lord
Exo  The man of wealth is to give no more and the poor man no less than the halfshekel of silver when the offering is made to the Lord as the price for your lives
Exo  And you are to take this money from the children of Israel to be used for the work of the Tent of meeting to keep the memory of the children of Israel before the Lord and to be the price of your lives
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  You are to make a brass washingvessel with a brass base and put it between the Tent of meeting and the altar with water in it
Exo  That it may be used by Aaron and his sons for washing their hands and feet
Exo  Whenever they go into the Tent of meeting they are to be washed with water to keep them from death and whenever they come near to do the work of the altar or to make an offering by fire to the Lord
Exo  Their hands and feet are to be washed so that they may be safe from death this is an order to them for ever to him and his seed from generation to generation
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  Take the best spices five hundred shekels weight of liquid myrrh and of sweet cinnamon half as much that is two hundred and fifty shekels and two hundred and fifty shekels of sweet calamus
Exo  And of cassia five hundred shekels weight measured by the scale of the holy place and of olive oil a hin
Exo  And make these into a holy oil a perfume made by the art of the perfumemaker it is to be a holy oil
Exo  This oil is to be put on the Tent of meeting and on the ark of the law
Exo  And on the table and all its vessels and on the support for the lights with its vessels and on the altar for burning spices
Exo  And on the altar of burned offerings with its vessels and on the washingvessel and its base
Exo  And you are to make them most holy anything touching them will become holy
Exo  And put the oil on Aaron and his sons making them holy to do the work of priests to me
Exo  And say to the children of Israel This is to be the Lords holy oil from generation to generation
Exo  It is not to be used for mans flesh and no other is to be made like it holy it is and you are to keep it holy
Exo  Whoever makes any like it or puts it on one who is not a priest will be cut off from his people
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Take sweet spices stacte and onycha and galbanum with the best frankincense in equal weights
Exo  And make from them a perfume such as is made by the art of the perfumemaker mixed with salt and clean and holy
Exo  And put some of it crushed very small in front of the ark in the Tent of meeting where I will come face to face with you it is to be most holy
Exo  You are not to make any perfume like it for yourselves it is to be kept holy to the Lord
Exo  Whoever makes any like it for its sweet smell will be cut off from his people
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  I have made selection of Bezalel the son of Uri by name the son of Hur of the tribe of Judah
Exo  And I have given him the spirit of God and made him wise and full of knowledge and expert in every sort of handwork
Exo  To do all sorts of delicate work in gold and silver and brass
Exo  In cutting stones for framing and to do every form of woodwork
Exo  And I have made selection of Oholiab with him the son of Ahisamach of the tribe of Dan and in the hearts of all who are wise I have put the knowledge to make whatever I have given you orders to have made
Exo  The Tent of meeting and the ark of the law and the cover which is on it and all the things for the tent
Exo  And the table with its vessels and the holy lightsupport with all its vessels and the altar for the burning of spices
Exo  And the altar of burned offerings with all its vessels and the washingvessel with its base
Exo  And the robes of needlework the holy robes for Aaron and for his sons for their use when acting as priests
Exo  And the holy oil and the perfume of sweet spices for the holy place they will do whatever I have given you orders to have done
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  Say to the children of Israel that they are to keep my Sabbaths for the Sabbath day is a sign between me and you through all your generations so that you may see that I am the Lord who makes you holy
Exo  So you are to keep the Sabbath as a holy day and anyone not honouring it will certainly be put to death whoever does any work on that day will be cut off from his people
Exo  Six days may work be done but the seventh day is a Sabbath of complete rest holy to the Lord whoever does any work on the Sabbath day is to be put to death
Exo  And the children of Israel are to keep the Sabbath holy from generation to generation by an eternal agreement
Exo  It is a sign between me and the children of Israel for ever because in six days the Lord made heaven and earth and on the seventh day he took his rest and had pleasure in it
Exo  And when his talk with Moses on Mount Sinai was ended he gave him the two stones of the law two stones on which was the writing made by the finger of God
Exo  And when the people saw that Moses was a long time coming down from the mountain they all came to Aaron and said to him Come make us a god to go before us as for this Moses who took us up out of the land of Egypt we have no idea what has become of him
Exo  Then Aaron said to them Take off the gold rings which are in the ears of your wives and your sons and your daughters and give them to me
Exo  And all the people took the gold rings from their ears and gave them to Aaron
Exo  And he took the gold from them and hammering it with an instrument he made it into the metal image of a young ox and they said This is your god O Israel who took you out of the land of Egypt
Exo  And when Aaron saw this he made an altar before it and made a public statement saying Tomorrow there will be a feast to the Lord
Exo  So early on the day after they got up and made burned offerings and peaceofferings and took their seats at the feast and then gave themselves to pleasure
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Go down quickly for your people whom you took out of the land of Egypt are turned to evil ways
Exo  Even now they are turned away from the rule I gave them and have made themselves a metal ox and given worship to it and offerings saying This is your god O Israel who took you up out of the land of Egypt
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses I have been watching this people and I see that they are a stiffnecked people
Exo  Now do not get in my way for my wrath is burning against them I will send destruction on them but of you I will make a great nation
Exo  But Moses made prayer to God saying Lord why is your wrath burning against your people whom you took out of the land of Egypt with great power and with the strength of your hand
Exo  Why let the Egyptians say He took them out to an evil fate to put them to death on the mountains cutting them off from the earth Let your wrath be turned away from them and send not this evil on your people
Exo  Have in mind Abraham Isaac and Israel your servants to whom you gave your oath saying I will make your seed like the stars of heaven in number and all this land will I give to your seed as I said to be their heritage for ever
Exo  So the Lord let himself be turned from his purpose of sending punishment on his people
Exo  Then Moses came down the mountain with the two stones of the law in his hand the stones had writing on their two sides on the front and on the back
Exo  The stones were the work of God and the writing was the writing of God cut on the stones
Exo  Now when the noise and the voices of the people came to the ears of Joshua he said to Moses There is a noise of war in the tents
Exo  And Moses said It is not the voice of men who are overcoming in the fight or the cry of those who have been overcome it is the sound of songs which comes to my ear
Exo  And when he came near the tents he saw the image of the ox and the people dancing and in his wrath Moses let the stones go from his hands and they were broken at the foot of the mountain
Exo  And he took the ox which they had made burning it in the fire and crushing it to powder and he put it in the water and made the children of Israel take a drink of it
Exo  And Moses said to Aaron What did the people do to you that you let this great sin come on them
Exo  And Aaron said Let not my lord be angry you have seen how the purposes of this people are evil
Exo  For they said to me Make us a god to go before us as for this Moses who took us up out of the land of Egypt we have no idea what has come to him
Exo  Then I said to them Whoever has any gold let him take it off so they gave it to me and I put it in the fire and this image of an ox came out
Exo  And Moses saw that the people were out of control for Aaron had let them loose to their shame before their haters
Exo  Then Moses took his place at the way into the tents and said Whoever is on the Lords side let him come to me And all the sons of Levi came together to him
Exo  And he said to them This is the word of the Lord the God of Israel Let every man take his sword at his side and go from one end of the tents to the other putting to death his brother and his friend and his neighbour
Exo  And the sons of Levi did as Moses said and about three thousand of the people were put to death that day
Exo  And Moses said You have made yourselves priests to the Lord this day for every one of you has made the offering of his son and his brother the blessing of the Lord is on you this day
Exo  And on the day after Moses said to the people Great has been your sin but I will go up to the Lord and see if I may get forgiveness for your sin
Exo  Then Moses went back to the Lord and said This people has done a great sin making themselves a god of gold
Exo  But now if you will give them forgivenessbut if not let my name be taken out of your book
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Whoever has done evil against me will be taken out of my book
Exo  But now go take the people into that place of which I have given you word see my angel will go before you but when the time of my judging has come I will send punishment on them for their sin
Exo  And the Lord sent punishment on the people because they gave worship to the ox which Aaron made
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Go forward from this place you and the people whom you have taken up out of the land of Egypt to that land about which I made an oath to Abraham Isaac and Jacob saying To your seed will I give it
Exo  And I will send an angel before you driving out the Canaanite and the Amorite and the Hittite and the Perizzite and the Hivite and the Jebusite
Exo  Go up to that land flowing with milk and honey but I will not go up among you for you are a stiffnecked people for fear that I send destruction on you while you are on the way
Exo  Hearing this bad news the people were full of grief and no one put on his ornaments
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Say to the children of Israel You are a stiffnecked people if I come among you even for a minute I will send destruction on you so take off all your ornaments so that I may see what to do with you
Exo  So the children of Israel took off their ornaments at Mount Horeb and did not put them on again
Exo  Now it was Moses way to put up the Tent of meeting outside the tentcircle at some distance away giving it the name of The Tent of meeting And everyone desiring to make his prayer to the Lord went to the Tent of meeting outside the tentcircle
Exo  And whenever Moses went out to the Tent of meeting all the people got up and everyone went to the door of his tent looking after Moses till he went inside the Tent
Exo  And whenever Moses went into the Tent the pillar of cloud came down and took its place by the door of the Tent as long as the Lord was talking with Moses
Exo  And all the people saw the cloud at the door of the Tent and they went down on their faces everyone at the door of his tent
Exo  And the Lord had talk with Moses face to face as a man may have talk with his friend And when Moses came back to the tents his servant the young man Joshua the son of Nun did not come away from the Tent
Exo  And Moses said to the Lord See you say to me Be this peoples guide on their journey but you have not made clear to me whom you will send with me But you have said I have knowledge of you by name and you have grace in my eyes
Exo  If then I have grace in your eyes let me see your ways so that I may have knowledge of you and be certain of your grace and my prayer is that you will keep in mind that this nation is your people
Exo  And he said I myself will go with you and give you rest
Exo  And Moses said If you yourself are not going with us do not send us on from here
Exo  For is not the fact of your going with us the sign that I and this people have grace in your eyes so that we that is I and your people are separate from all other people on the face of the earth
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses I will do as you say for you have grace in my eyes and I have knowledge of you by your name
Exo  And Moses said O Lord let me see your glory
Exo  And he said I will make all the light of my being come before you and will make clear to you what I am I will be kind to those to whom I will be kind and have mercy on those on whom I will have mercy
Exo  But it is not possible for you to see my face for no man may see me and still go on living
Exo  And the Lord said See there is a place near me and you may take your place on the rock
Exo  And when my glory goes by I will put you in a hole in the rock covering you with my hand till I have gone past
Exo  Then I will take away my hand and you will see my back but my face is not to be seen
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Make two other stones like the first two and I will put on them the words which were on the first stones which were broken by you
Exo  And be ready by the morning and come up on Mount Sinai and come before me there in the morning on the top of the mountain
Exo  No one is to come up with you and let no man be seen anywhere on the mountain let no flocks or herds come near to get their food at its foot
Exo  So Moses got two stones cut like the first and early in the morning he went up Mount Sinai as the Lord had said with the two stones in his hand
Exo  And the Lord came down in the cloud and took his place by the side of Moses and Moses gave worship to the name of the Lord
Exo  And the Lord went past before his eyes saying The Lord the Lord a God full of pity and grace slow to wrath and great in mercy and faith
Exo  Having mercy on thousands overlooking evil and wrongdoing and sin he will not let wrongdoers go free but will send punishment on children for the sins of their fathers and on their childrens children to the third and fourth generation
Exo  Then Moses quickly went down on his face in worship
Exo  And he said If now I have grace in your eyes let the Lord go among us for this is a stiffnecked people and give us forgiveness for our wrongdoing and our sin and take us for your heritage
Exo  And the Lord said See this is what I will undertake before the eyes of your people I will do wonders such as have not been done in all the earth or in any nation and all your people will see the work of the Lord for what I am about to do for you is greatly to be feared
Exo  Take care to do the orders which I give you today I will send out from before you the Amorite and the Canaanite and the Hittite and the Perizzite and the Hivite and the Jebusite
Exo  But take care and do not make any agreement with the people of the land where you are going for it will be a cause of sin to you
Exo  But their altars are to be overturned and their pillars broken and their images cut down
Exo  For you are to be worshippers of no other god for the Lord is a God who will not give his honour to another
Exo  So see that you make no agreement with the people of the land and do not go after their gods or take part in their offerings or be guests at their feasts
Exo  Or take their daughters for your sons for when their daughters give worship before their gods they will make your sons take part with them
Exo  Make for yourselves no gods of metal
Exo  Keep the feast of unleavened bread for seven days your food is to be bread without leaven as I gave you orders at the regular time in the month Abib for in that month you came out of Egypt
Exo  Every first male child is mine the first male birth of your cattle the first male of every ox and sheep
Exo  A lamb may be given in payment for the young of an ass but if you will not make payment for it its neck will have to be broken For all the first of your sons you are to make payment No one is to come before me without an offering
Exo  Six days let work be done but on the seventh day take your rest at ploughing time and at the graincutting you are to have a day for rest
Exo  And you are to keep the feast of weeks when you get in the firstfruits of the grain and the feast at the turn of the year when you take in the produce of your fields
Exo  Three times in the year let all your males come before the Lord the God of Israel
Exo  For I will send out the nations before you and make wide the limits of your land and no man will make an attempt to take your land while you go up to give worship to the Lord three times in the year
Exo  No leaven is to be offered with the blood of my offering and the offering of the Passover feast may not be kept till the morning
Exo  Take the firstfruits of your land as an offering to the house of the Lord your God Let not the young goat be cooked in its mothers milk
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses Put all these words in writing for on them is based the agreement which I will make with you
Exo  And for forty days and forty nights Moses was there with the Lord and in that time he had no food or drink And he put in writing on the stones the words of the agreement the ten rules of the law
Exo  Now when Moses came down from Mount Sinai with the two stones in his hand he was not conscious that his face was shining because of his talk with God
Exo  But when Aaron and all the children of Israel saw Moses and the shining of his face they would not come near him for fear
Exo  Then Moses sent for them and Aaron with the chiefs of the people came to him and Moses had talk with them
Exo  And later all the children of Israel came near and he gave them all the orders which the Lord had given him on Mount Sinai
Exo  And at the end of his talk with them Moses put a veil over his face
Exo  But whenever Moses went in before the Lord to have talk with him he took off the veil till he came out And whenever he came out he said to the children of Israel what he had been ordered to say
Exo  And the children of Israel saw that the face of Moses was shining so Moses put the veil over his face again till he went to the Lord
Exo  And Moses sent for all the children of Israel to come together and said to them This is what the Lord has said and these are his orders
Exo  Six days let work be done but the seventh day is to be a holy day to you a Sabbath of rest to the Lord whoever does any work on that day is to be put to death
Exo  No fire is to be lighted in any of your houses on the Sabbath day
Exo  And Moses said to all the meeting of the children of Israel This is the order which the Lord has given
Exo  Take from among you an offering to the Lord everyone who has the impulse in his heart let him give his offering to the Lord gold and silver and brass
Exo  And blue and purple and red and the best linen and goats hair
Exo  And sheepskins coloured red and leather and hard wood
Exo  And oil for the lights and spices for the holy oil and for the sweet perfumes for burning
Exo  And beryls and jewels to be cut for the ephod and for the priests bag
Exo  And let every wisehearted man among you come and make whatever has been ordered by the Lord
Exo  The House and its tent and its cover its hooks and its boards its rods and its pillars and its bases
Exo  The ark with its cover and its rods and the veil hanging before it
Exo  The table and its rods and all its vessels and the holy bread
Exo  And the support for the lights with its vessels and its lights and the oil for the light
Exo  And the altar for burning spices with its rods and the holy oil and the sweet perfume and the curtain for the door at the door of the House
Exo  The altar of burned offerings with its network of brass its rods and all its vessels the washingvessel and its base
Exo  The hangings for the open space its pillars and their bases and the curtain for the doorway
Exo  The nails for the House and the nails for the open space and their cords
Exo  The robes of needlework for the work of the holy place the holy robes for Aaron the priest and the robes for his sons when acting as priests
Exo  And all the children of Israel went away from Moses
Exo  And everyone whose heart was moved everyone who was guided by the impulse of his spirit came with his offering for the Lord for whatever was needed for the Tent of meeting and its work and for the holy robes
Exo  They came men and women all who were ready to give and gave pins and noserings and fingerrings and neckornaments all of gold everyone gave an offering of gold to the Lord
Exo  And everyone who had blue and purple and red and the best linen and goats hair and sheepskins coloured red and leather gave them
Exo  Everyone who had silver and brass gave an offering of them to the Lord and everyone who had hard wood such as was needed for the work gave it
Exo  And all the women who were expert with their hands made cloth and gave the work of their hands blue and purple and red and the best linen
Exo  And those women who had the knowledge made the goats hair into cloth
Exo  And the rulers gave the beryls and the cut jewels for the ephod and the priests bag
Exo  And the spice and the oil for the light and the holy oil and the sweet perfumes
Exo  The children of Israel every man and woman from the impulse of their hearts gave their offerings freely to the Lord for the work which the Lord had given Moses orders to have done
Exo  And Moses said to the children of Israel See the Lord has made selection of Bezalel the son of Uri the son of Hur of the tribe of Judah
Exo  And he has made him full of the spirit of God in all wisdom and knowledge and art of every sort
Exo  As an expert designer of beautiful things working in gold and silver and brass
Exo  Trained in the cutting of stones and the ornamenting of wood and in every sort of handwork
Exo  And he has given to him and to Oholiab the son of Ahisamach of the tribe of Dan the power of training others
Exo  To them he has given knowledge of all the arts of the handworker of the designer and the expert workman of the maker of needlework in blue and purple and red and the best linen and of the maker of cloth in all the arts of the designer and the trained workman they are expert
Exo  So let Bezalel and Oholiab get to work with every wisehearted man to whom the Lord has given wisdom and knowledge to do whatever is necessary for the ordering of the holy place as the Lord has given orders
Exo  Then Moses sent for Bezalel and Oholiab and for all the wisehearted men to whom the Lord had given wisdom even everyone who was moved by the impulse of his heart to come and take part in the work
Exo  And they took from Moses all the offerings which the children of Israel had given for the building of the holy place And still they went on giving him more free offerings every morning
Exo  Then the wise men who were doing all the work of the holy place came from their work
Exo  And said to Moses The people are giving much more than is needed for the work which the Lord has given us orders to do
Exo  So Moses made an order and had it given out through all the tents saying Let no man or woman make any more offerings for the holy place So the people were kept from giving more
Exo  For the material they had was enough and more than enough for all the work which had to be done
Exo  Then all the expert workmen among them made the House with its ten curtains of the best linen blue and purple and red they made them with winged ones worked by expert designers
Exo  Every curtain was twentyeight cubits long and four cubits wide all of the same measure
Exo  And five curtains were joined together and the other five curtains were joined together
Exo  And they put twists of blue cord on the edge of the outside curtain of the first group and in the same way on the outside curtain of the second group
Exo  Fifty twists on the one curtain and fifty on the edge of the curtain of the other group the twists being opposite to one another
Exo  And they made fifty hooks of gold joining the curtains one to another with the hooks and so the House was made
Exo  And they made curtains of goats hair for the tent eleven curtains were made
Exo  Every curtain was thirty cubits long and four cubits wide all of the same measure
Exo  Five curtains were joined together to make one group and six curtains were joined together to make the other group
Exo  And they put fifty twists of cord on the edge of the outside curtain of the first group and fifty twists on the edge of the outside curtain of the second group
Exo  And fifty hooks of brass for joining them together to make the tent
Exo  And they made a cover of sheepskins coloured red to go over the tent and a cover of leather over that
Exo  And for the uprights of the House they made boards of hard wood
Exo  The boards were ten cubits long and one cubit and a half wide
Exo  Every board had two tongues fixed into it all the boards were made in this way
Exo  They made twenty boards for the south side of the House
Exo  And for these twenty boards forty silver bases two bases under every board to take its tongues
Exo  And for the second side of the House on the north they made twenty boards
Exo  With their forty silver bases two bases for every board
Exo  And for the west side of the House at the back they made six boards
Exo  And two boards for the angles at the back
Exo  These were joined together at the base and at the top to one ring so forming the two angles
Exo  So there were eight boards with sixteen bases of silver two bases under every board
Exo  And they made rods of hard wood five for the boards on one side of the House
Exo  And five for the boards on the other side of the House and five for the boards at the back on the west
Exo  The middle rod was made to go right through the rings of all the boards from one end to the other
Exo  All the boards were plated with gold and the rings through which the rods went were of gold and the rods were plated with gold
Exo  And he made the veil of the best linen blue and purple and red worked with winged ones designed by expert workmen
Exo  And they made four pillars for it of hard wood plated with gold they had hooks of gold and four silver bases
Exo  And they made a curtain for the door of the tent of the best linen with needlework of blue and purple and red
Exo  And five pillars for the curtain with their hooks the heads of the pillars were of gold and they were circled with bands of gold and their five bases were of brass
Exo  And Bezalel made the ark of hard wood two and a half cubits long a cubit and a half wide and a cubit and a half high
Exo  Plating it inside and out with the best gold and putting an edge of gold all round it
Exo  And he made four gold rings for its four angles two on one side and two on the other
Exo  And rods of the same wood plated with gold
Exo  These rods he put in the rings at the sides of the ark for lifting it
Exo  And he made the cover all of gold two and a half cubits long and a cubit and a half wide
Exo  And he made two winged ones hammered out of one bit of gold for the two ends of the cover
Exo  Placing one at one end and one at the other the winged ones were part of the cover
Exo  And their wings were stretched out over the cover the faces of the winged ones were opposite one another and facing the cover
Exo  And he made the table of hard wood two cubits long a cubit wide and a cubit and a half high
Exo  Plating it with the best gold and putting a gold edge all round it
Exo  And he made a frame all round it about as wide as a mans hand edged with gold all round
Exo  And he made four gold rings and put the rings at the angles of its four feet
Exo  The rings were fixed under the frame to take the rods with which the table was to be lifted
Exo  The rods for lifting the table he made of hard wood plated with gold
Exo  And all the tablevessels the plates and spoons and basins and the cups for liquids he made of the best gold
Exo  Then he made the support for the lights all of the best gold its base and its pillar were of hammered gold its cups and buds and flowers were all made out of the same metal
Exo  It had six branches coming out from its sides three from one side and three from the other
Exo  Every branch having three cups made like almond flowers every cup with a bud and a flower on all the branches
Exo  And on its pillar four cups like almond flowers every one with its bud and its flower
Exo  And under every two branches a bud made with the branch for all six branches of it
Exo  The buds and the branches were made of the same metal all together one complete work of the best hammered gold
Exo  And he made the seven vessels for the lights and all the necessary instruments for it of gold
Exo  A talent of the best gold was used for the making of it and its vessels
Exo  And he made the altar for the burning of spices using the same hard wood it was square a cubit long and a cubit wide and two cubits high the horns made of the same
Exo  The top and the sides and the horns were all plated with the best gold and he put an edge of gold all round it
Exo  And he made two gold rings placing them on the two opposite sides under the edge to take the rods for lifting it
Exo  The rods he made of the same hard wood plating them with gold
Exo  And he made the holy oil and the perfume of sweet spices for burning after the art of the perfumemaker
Exo  The altar of burned offerings he made of hard wood a square altar five cubits long five cubits wide and three cubits high
Exo  And he put horns at its four angles made of the same plating it all with brass
Exo  And brass was used for all the vessels of the altar the baskets and the spades the basins and the meathooks and the firetrays all the vessels he made of brass
Exo  And he made a network of brass for the altar under the frame round it stretching halfway up
Exo  And four rings for the four angles of this network to take the rods
Exo  The rods he made of hard wood plated with brass
Exo  He put the rods through the rings at the opposite sides of the altar for lifting it he made the altar hollow boarded in with wood
Exo  And he made the washingvessel of brass on a brass base using the polished brass lookingglasses given by the women who did work at the doors of the Tent of meeting
Exo  To make the open space he put hangings on the south side of the best linen a hundred cubits long
Exo  Their twenty pillars and their twenty bases were brass and the hooks of the pillars and their bands were of silver
Exo  And for the north side hangings a hundred cubits long on twenty brass pillars in brass bases with silver hooks and bands
Exo  And on the west side hangings fifty cubits long on ten pillars in ten bases with silver bands
Exo  And on the east side the open space was fifty cubits long
Exo  The hangings on one side of the doorway were fifteen cubits long on three pillars with their three bases
Exo  And the same on the other side of the doorway on this side and on that the hangings were fifteen cubits long on three pillars with their three bases
Exo  All the hangings were of the best linen
Exo  And the bases of the pillars were of brass their hooks and the bands round the tops of them were of silver all the pillars were ringed with silver
Exo  And the curtain for the doorway of the open space was of the best linen with designs of blue and purple and red in needlework it was twenty cubits long and five cubits high to go with the hangings round the sides
Exo  There were four pillars with their bases all of brass the hooks being of silver and their tops and their bands being covered with silver
Exo  All the nails used for the House and the open space round it were of brass
Exo  This is the price of the making of the House even the House of witness as it was valued by the word of Moses for the work of the Levites under the direction of Ithamar the son of Aaron the priest
Exo  Bezalel the son of Uri the son of Hur of the tribe of Judah made everything as the Lord had given orders to Moses
Exo  And with him was Oholiab the son of Ahisamach of the tribe of Dan a designer and a trained workman expert in needlework of blue and purple and red and the best linen
Exo  The gold used for all the different work done for the holy place the gold which was given was twentynine talents and seven hundred and thirty shekels in weight by the scale of the holy place
Exo  And the silver given by those who were numbered of the people was a hundred talents and a thousand seven hundred and seventyfive shekels in weight by the scale of the holy place
Exo  A beka that is half a shekel by the holy scale for everyone who was numbered there were six hundred and three thousand five hundred and fifty men of twenty years old and over
Exo  Of this silver a hundred talents was used for making the bases of the pillars of the holy place and of the veil a talent for every base
Exo  And a thousand seven hundred and seventyfive shekels of silver was used to make the hooks for the pillars and for plating the tops of the pillars and for making their bands
Exo  The brass which was given was seventy talents two thousand four hundred shekels
Exo  From it he made the bases of the doorway of the Tent of meeting and the brass altar and the network for it and all the vessels for the altar
Exo  And the bases for the open space all round and for its doorway and all the nails for the House and for the open space
Exo  And from the needlework of blue and purple and red they made the robes used for the work of the holy place and the holy robes for Aaron as the Lord had given orders to Moses
Exo  The ephod he made of gold and blue and purple and red and the best linen
Exo  Hammering the gold into thin plates and cutting it into wires to be worked into the blue and the purple and the red and the linen by the designer
Exo  And they made two bands for joining its edges together at the top of the arms
Exo  And the beautifully worked band which went on it was of the same design and the same material worked in gold and blue and purple and red and twisted linenwork as the Lord gave orders to Moses
Exo  Then they made the beryl stones fixed in twisted frames of gold and cut like the cutting of a stamp with the names of the children of Israel
Exo  These he put on the ephod over the armholes to be stones of memory for the children of Israel as the Lord had said to Moses
Exo  The priests bag was designed like the ephod of the best linen worked with gold and blue and purple and red
Exo  It was square and folded in two as long and as wide as the stretch of a mans hand
Exo  And on it they put four lines of stones in the first line was a carnelian a chrysolite and an emerald
Exo  In the second a ruby a sapphire and an onyx
Exo  In the third a jacinth an agate and an amethyst
Exo  In the fourth a topaz a beryl and a jasper they were fixed in twisted frames of gold
Exo  There were twelve stones for the twelve tribes of Israel on every one the name of one of the tribes of Israel was cut like the cutting of a stamp
Exo  And on the bag they put gold chains twisted like cords
Exo  And they made two gold frames and two gold rings the rings being fixed to the ends of the priests bag
Exo  And they put the two twisted chains on the two rings at the ends of the priests bag
Exo  And the other two ends of the chains were joined to the two frames and fixed to the front of the ephod over the armholes
Exo  And they made two rings of gold and put them on the two lower ends of the bag on the inner side nearest to the ephod
Exo  And two other gold rings were put on the front of the ephod over the armholes at the join and over the worked band
Exo  And the rings on the bag were fixed to the rings of the ephod by a blue cord keeping it in place over the band so that the bag might not get loose as the Lord gave orders to Moses
Exo  The robe which went with the ephod was made all of blue
Exo  With a hole at the top in the middle like the hole in the coat of a fightingman edged with a band to make it strong
Exo  The skirts of the robe were worked all round with fruits in blue and purple and red made of twisted linen
Exo  And between the fruits all round the skirt they put gold bells as the Lord gave orders to Moses
Exo  All round the skirt of the robe were bells and fruits in turn
Exo  The coats for Aaron and his sons they made of the best linen
Exo  And the twisted headdress for Aaron and beautiful headdresses of linen and linen trousers
Exo  And a linen band worked with a design of blue and purple and red as the Lord had said to Moses
Exo  The plate for the holy crown was made of the best gold and on it were cut these words HOLY TO THE LORD
Exo  It was fixed to the headdress by a blue cord as the Lord had given orders to Moses
Exo  So all the work on the House of the Tent of meeting was done as the Lord had given orders to Moses so the children of Israel did it
Exo  Then they took the House to Moses the tent with all the things for it its hooks its boards its rods its pillars and its bases
Exo  The outer cover of sheepskins coloured red and the cover of leather and the veil for the doorway
Exo  The ark of the law with its rods and its cover
Exo  The table with all its vessels and the holy bread
Exo  The support for the lights with the vessels for the lights to be put in their places on it and all its vessels and the oil for the lights
Exo  And the gold altar and the holy oil and the sweet perfume for burning and the curtain for the doorway of the tent
Exo  And the brass altar with its network of brass and its rods and all its vessels and the washingvessel and its base
Exo  The hangings for the open space with the pillars and their bases and the curtain for the doorway and the cords and nails and all the instruments necessary for the work of the House of the Tent of meeting
Exo  The robes for use in the holy place and the holy robes for Aaron and his sons when acting as priests
Exo  The children of Israel did everything as the Lord had given orders to Moses
Exo  Then Moses when he saw all their work and saw that they had done everything as the Lord had said gave them his blessing
Exo  And the Lord said to Moses
Exo  On the first day of the first month you are to put up the House of the Tent of meeting
Exo  And inside it put the ark of the law hanging the veil before it
Exo  And put the table inside placing all the things on it in order and put in the support for the lights and let its lights be burning
Exo  And put the gold altar for burning perfumes in front of the ark of the law hanging the curtain over the doorway of the House
Exo  And put the altar of burned offerings before the doorway of the House of the Tent of meeting
Exo  And let the washingvessel with water in it be put between the Tent of meeting and the altar
Exo  And put up the hangings forming the open space all round it with the curtain over its doorway
Exo  And take the holy oil and put it on the House and everything in it and make it and everything in it holy
Exo  And put oil on the altar of burned offering and make it and all its vessels holy this altar is to be most holy
Exo  And put oil on the washingvessel and its base and make them holy
Exo  Then let Aaron and his sons come to the door of the Tent of meeting and after washing them with water
Exo  You are to put on Aaron the holy robes and you are to put oil on him and make him holy so that he may be my priest
Exo  And take his sons with him and put coats on them
Exo  And put oil on them as you did on their father so that they may be my priests the putting on of oil will make them priests for ever from generation to generation
Exo  And Moses did this as the Lord gave him orders so he did
Exo  So on the first day of the first month in the second year the House was put up
Exo  Moses put up the House placing its bases in position and lifting up its uprights putting in the rods and planting the pillars in their places
Exo  Stretching the outer tent over it and covering it as the Lord had given him orders
Exo  And he took the law and put it inside the ark and put the rods at its side and the cover over it
Exo  And he took the ark into the House hanging up the veil before it as the Lord had given him orders
Exo  And he put the table in the Tent of meeting on the north side outside the veil
Exo  And he put the bread on it in order before the Lord as the Lord had said
Exo  The support for the lights he put in the Tent of meeting opposite the table on the south side
Exo  Lighting the lights before the Lord as the Lord had given him orders
Exo  And he put the gold altar in the Tent of meeting in front of the veil
Exo  Burning sweet perfumes on it as the Lord had given him orders
Exo  And he put up the curtain at the doorway of the House
Exo  And at the door of the House of the Tent of meeting he put the altar of burned offerings offering on it the burned offering and the meal offering as the Lord had given him orders
Exo  And between the altar and the Tent of meeting he put the vessel with water in it for washing
Exo  In it the hands and feet of Moses and Aaron and his sons were washed
Exo  Whenever they went into the Tent of meeting and when they came near the altar as the Lord had given orders to Moses
Exo  And he put up the hangings forming the open space round the House and the altar and put the curtain over the doorway So Moses made the work complete
Exo  Then the cloud came down covering the Tent of meeting and the House was full of the glory of the Lord
Exo  So that Moses was not able to go into the Tent of meeting because the cloud was resting on it and the House was full of the glory of the Lord
Exo  And whenever the cloud was taken up from the House the children of Israel went forward on their journey
Exo  But while the cloud was there they made no move till it was taken up
Exo  For the cloud of the Lord was resting on the House by day and at night there was fire in the cloud before the eyes of all the people of Israel and so it was through all their journeys
Lev  And the voice of the Lord came to Moses out of the Tent of meeting saying
Lev  Give these orders to the children of Israel When anyone of you makes an offering to the Lord you are to take it from the cattle from the herd or from the flock
Lev  If the offering is a burned offering of the herd let him give a male without a mark he is to give it at the door of the Tent of meeting so that he may be pleasing to the Lord
Lev  And he is to put his hand on the head of the burned offering and it will be taken for him to take away his sin
Lev  And the ox is to be put to death before the Lord then Aarons sons the priests are to take the blood and put some of it on and round the altar which is at the door of the Tent of meeting
Lev  And the burned offering is to be skinned and cut up into its parts
Lev  And Aarons sons the priests are to put fire on the altar and put the wood in order on the fire
Lev  And Aarons sons the priests are to put the parts the head and the fat in order on the wood which is on the fire on the altar
Lev  But its inside parts and its legs are to be washed with water and it will all be burned on the altar by the priest for a burned offering an offering made by fire for a sweet smell to the Lord
Lev  And if his offering is of the flock a burned offering of sheep or goats let him give a male without a mark
Lev  And he is to put it to death on the north side of the altar before the Lord and Aarons sons the priests are to put some of the blood on and round the altar
Lev  And the offering is to be cut into its parts with its head and its fat and the priest is to put them in order on the wood which is on the fire on the altar
Lev  But the inside parts and the legs are to be washed with water and the priest will make an offering of all of it burning it on the altar it is a burned offering an offering made by fire for a sweet smell to the Lord
Lev  And if his offering to the Lord is a burned offering of birds then he is to make his offering of doves or of young pigeons
Lev  And the priest is to take it to the altar and after its head has been twisted off it is to be burned on the altar and its blood drained out on the side of the altar
Lev  And he is to take away its stomach with its feathers and put it down by the east side of the altar where the burned waste is put
Lev  And let it be broken open at the wings but not cut in two and let it be burned on the altar by the priest on the wood which is on the fire it is a burned offering an offering made by fire for a sweet smell to the Lord
Lev  And when anyone makes a meal offering to the Lord let his offering be of the best meal with oil on it and perfume
Lev  And let him take it to Aarons sons the priests and having taken in his hand some of the meal and of the oil with all the perfume let him give it to the priest to be burned on the altar as a sign an offering made by fire for a sweet smell to the Lord
Lev  And the rest of the meal offering will be for Aaron and his sons it is most holy among the Lords fire offerings
Lev  And when you give a meal offering cooked in the oven let it be of unleavened cakes of the best meal mixed with oil or thin unleavened cakes covered with oil
Lev  And if you give a meal offering cooked on a flat plate let it be of the best meal unleavened and mixed with oil
Lev  Let it be broken into bits and put oil on it it is a meal offering
Lev  And if your offering is of meal cooked in fat over the fire let it be made of the best meal mixed with oil
Lev  And you are to give the meal offering made of these things to the Lord and let the priest take it to the altar
Lev  And he is to take from the meal offering a part for a sign burning it on the altar an offering made by fire for a sweet smell to the Lord
Lev  And the rest of the meal offering will be for Aaron and his sons it is most holy among the Lords fire offerings
Lev  No meal offering which you give to the Lord is to be made with leaven no leaven or honey is to be burned as an offering made by fire to the Lord
Lev  You may give them as an offering of firstfruits to the Lord but they are not to go up as a sweet smell on the altar
Lev  And every meal offering is to be salted with salt your meal offering is not to be without the salt of the agreement of your God with all your offerings give salt
Lev  And if you give a meal offering of firstfruits to the Lord give as your offering of firstfruits new grain made dry with fire crushed new grain
Lev  And put oil on it and perfume it is a meal offering
Lev  And part of the meal of the offering and part of the oil and all the perfume is to be burned for a sign by the priest it is an offering made by fire to the Lord
Lev  And if his offering is given for a peaceoffering if he gives of the herd male or female let him give it without any mark on it before the Lord
Lev  And he is to put his hand on the head of his offering and put it to death at the door of the Tent of meeting and Aarons sons the priests are to put some of the blood on and round the altar
Lev  And he is to give of the peaceoffering as an offering made by fire to the Lord the fat covering the inside parts and all the fat on the inside parts
Lev  And the two kidneys and the fat on them which is by the top part of the legs and the fat joining the liver and the kidneys he is to take away
Lev  That it may be burned by Aarons sons on the altar on the burned offering which is on the wood on the fire it is an offering made by fire of a sweet smell to the Lord
Lev  And if what he gives for a peaceoffering to the Lord is of the flock let him give a male or female without any mark on it
Lev  If his offering is a lamb then let it be placed before the Lord
Lev  And he is to put his hand on the head of his offering and put it to death before the Tent of meeting and Aarons sons are to put some of its blood on and round the altar
Lev  And of the peaceoffering let him give an offering made by fire to the Lord the fat of it all the fat tail he is to take away near the backbone and the fat covering the inside parts and all the fat on the inside parts
Lev  And the two kidneys with the fat on them which is by the top part of the legs and the fat joining the liver and the kidneys he is to take away
Lev  That it may be burned by the priest on the altar it is the food of the offering made by fire to the Lord
Lev  And if his offering is a goat then let it be placed before the Lord
Lev  And let him put his hand on the head of it and put it to death before the Tent of meeting and the sons of Aaron are to put some of its blood on and round the altar
Lev  And of it let him make his offering an offering made by fire to the Lord the fat covering the inside parts and all the fat on the inside parts
Lev  And the two kidneys with the fat on them which is by the top part of the legs and the fat joining the liver and the kidneys let him take away
Lev  That it may be burned by the priest on the altar it is the food of the offering made by fire for a sweet smell all the fat is the Lords
Lev  Let it be an order for ever through all your generations in all your houses that you are not to take fat or blood for food
Lev  And the Lord said to Moses
Lev  Say to the children of Israel These are the offerings of anyone who does wrong through error doing any of the things which by the Lords order are not to be done
Lev  If the chief priest by doing wrong becomes a cause of sin to the people then let him give to the Lord for the sin which he has done an ox without any mark for a sinoffering
Lev  And he is to take the ox to the door of the Tent of meeting before the Lord and put his hand on its head and put it to death before the Lord
Lev  And the chief priest is to take some of its blood and take it to the Tent of meeting
Lev  And the priest is to put his finger in the blood shaking drops of it before the Lord seven times in front of the veil of the holy place
Lev  And the priest is to put some of the blood on the horns of the altar on which perfume is burned before the Lord in the Tent of meeting draining out all the rest of the blood of the ox at the base of the altar of burned offering which is at the door of the Tent of meeting
Lev  And he is to take away all the fat of the ox of the sinoffering the fat covering the inside parts and all the fat of the inside parts
Lev  And the two kidneys with the fat on them which is by the top part of the legs and the fat joining the liver and the kidneys he is to take away
Lev  As it is taken from the ox of the peaceoffering and it is to be burned by the priest on the altar of burned offerings
Lev  And the skin of the ox and all its flesh with its head and its legs and its inside parts and its waste
Lev  All the ox he is to take away outside the circle of the tents into a clean place where the burned waste is put and there it is to be burned on wood with fire
Lev  And if all the people of Israel do wrong without anyones knowledge if they have done any of the things which by the Lords order are not to be done causing sin to come on them
Lev  When the sin which they have done comes to light then let all the people give an ox for a sinoffering and take it before the Tent of meeting
Lev  And let the chiefs of the people put their hands on its head before the Lord and put the ox to death before the Lord
Lev  And the priest is to take some of its blood to the Tent of meeting
Lev  And put his finger in the blood shaking drops of the blood seven times before the Lord in front of the veil
Lev  And he is to put some of the blood on the horns of the altar which is before the Lord in the Tent of meeting and all the rest of the blood is to be drained out at the base of the altar of burned offering at the door of the Tent of meeting
Lev  And he is to take off all its fat burning it on the altar
Lev  Let him do with the ox as he did with the ox of the sinoffering and the priest will take away their sin and they will have forgiveness
Lev  Then let the ox be taken away outside the tentcircle that it may be burned as the other ox was burned it is the sinoffering for all the people
Lev  If a ruler does wrong and in error does any of the things which by the order of the Lord his God are not to be done causing sin to come on him
Lev  When the sin which he has done is made clear to him let him give for his offering a goat a male without any mark
Lev  And he is to put his hand on the head of the goat and put it to death in the place where they put to death the burned offering before the Lord it is a sinoffering
Lev  And the priest is to take some of the blood of the offering with his finger and put it on the horns of the altar of burned offering draining out the rest of the blood at the base of the altar of burned offering
Lev  And all the fat of it is to be burned on the altar like the fat of the peaceoffering and the priest will take away his sin and he will have forgiveness
Lev  And if any one of the common people does wrong in error doing any of the things which the Lord has given orders are not to be done causing sin to come on him
Lev  When the sin which he has done is made clear to him then he is to give for his offering a goat a female without any mark for the sin which he has done
Lev  And he is to put his hand on the head of the sinoffering and put it to death in the place where they put to death the burned offering
Lev  And the priest is to take some of the blood with his finger and put it on the horns of the altar of burned offering and all the rest of its blood is to be drained out at the base of the altar
Lev  And let all its fat be taken away as the fat is taken away from the peaceofferings and let it be burned on the altar by the priest for a sweet smell to the Lord and the priest will take away his sin and he will have forgiveness
Lev  And if he gives a lamb as his sinoffering let it be a female without any mark
Lev  And he is to put his hand on the head of the offering and put it to death for a sinoffering in the place where they put to death the burned offering
Lev  And the priest is to take some of the blood of the offering with his finger and put it on the horns of the altar of burned offering and all the rest of the blood is to be drained out at the base of the altar
Lev  And let him take away all its fat as the fat is taken away from the lamb of the peaceofferings and let it be burned by the priest on the altar among the offerings made by fire to the Lord and the priest will take away his sin and he will have forgiveness
Lev  And if anyone does wrong by saying nothing when he is put under oath as a witness of something he has seen or had knowledge of then he will be responsible
Lev  If anyone becomes unclean through touching unconsciously some unclean thing such as the dead body of an unclean beast or of unclean cattle or of any unclean animal which goes flat on the earth he will be responsible
Lev  Or if he becomes unclean through touching unconsciously any unclean thing of man whatever it may be when it is made clear to him he will be responsible
Lev  Or if anyone without thought takes an oath to do evil or to do good whatever he says without thought with an oath having no knowledge of what he is doing when it becomes clear to him he will be responsible for any of these things
Lev  And whoever is responsible for any such sin let him make a statement openly of his wrongdoing
Lev  And take to the Lord the offering for the wrong which he has done a female from the flock a lamb or a goat for a sinoffering and the priest will take away his sin
Lev  And if he has not money enough for a lamb then let him give for his offering to the Lord two doves or two young pigeons one for a sinoffering and one for a burned offering
Lev  And let him take them to the priest who will first give the sinoffering twisting off its head from its neck but not cutting it in two
Lev  And he is to put drops of the blood of the offering on the side of the altar and the rest of the blood is to be drained out at the base of the altar it is a sinoffering
Lev  And the second is for a burned offering in agreement with the law and the priest will take away his sin and he will have forgiveness
Lev  But if he has not enough money for two doves or two young pigeons then let him give for the sin he has done the tenth part of an ephah of the best meal for a sinoffering let him put no oil on it and no perfume for it is a sinoffering
Lev  And let him come to the priest with it and the priest will take some of it in his hand to be burned on the altar as a sign among the offerings of the Lord made by fire it is a sinoffering
Lev  And the priest will take away his sin and he will have forgiveness and the rest of the offering will be the priests in the same way as the meal offering
Lev  And the Lord said to Moses
